segments.text: P-p-people come out from the suitcase?!
segments.speaker: Little Giant Tommy
segments.translation: 사-사-사람이 가방에서 나온다고?!

segments.text: Agh, it's a weirdo's case! She knows dark magic. Run!
segments.speaker: Pumpkin-Head Jame
segments.translation: 아악, 이상한 놈이야! 저 여자 흑마법을 써! 도망쳐!

segments.text: This is my suitcase. Please give it back to me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이건 내 여행 가방이야. 돌려줘.

segments.text: No! Don't touch me! Imma give it to the officer!
segments.speaker: Little Giant Tommy
segments.translation: 안 돼! 만지지 마! 이거 경찰관한테 줄 거야!

segments.text: Haha! Kiss my ass! You damn Basilisk losers!
segments.speaker: Pumpkin-Head Jame
segments.translation: 하하! 엿이나 먹어! 이 바실리스크 놈들아!

segments.text: ... When a pirate meets robbers? Robbing is not a good behavior that you kids should learn.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: ... 해적과 강도의 만남인가요? 강도질은 여러분과 같은 어린 친구들이 배울 만한 행동이 아니랍니다.

segments.text: That apple is talking!
segments.speaker: Pumpkin-Head Jame
segments.translation: 저 사과가 말을 하고 있어!

segments.text: Ew!! Throw rocks at it!!
segments.speaker: Pumpkin-Head Jame
segments.translation: 으악!! 돌을 던져!!

segments.text: Aww ...!
segments.speaker: APPLe

segments.text: Looks like the generation we met is not quite friendly.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 우리가 만난 이 시대는 우릴 반기는 것 같진 않네요.

segments.text: If they shake the suitcase like this, Regulus will probably fall apart.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이렇게 가방을 흔들면 레굴루스가 산산조각 날 거야.

segments.text: Mr. APPLe, I need your help.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미스터 APPLe, 도움이 필요해.

segments.text: My pleasure. This APPLe will shed some light on justice for them—well, won't violate the Declaration of the Rights of the Child.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 기꺼이 도와드리죠. 저 APPLe이 그들에게 정의의 빛을 비춰주겠습니다. 물론 아동 권리 선언을 위반하지 않는 선에서 말이에요.

segments.text: Hide it in the tree hole this time. It shouldn't be that easy to be found.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이번엔 나무 구멍 속에 숨겨야겠어. 쉽게 들키진 않을 거야.

segments.text: The situation of the arcanists 40 years ago looked much worse than ours. At least we can still talk to the human.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 40년 전 마도학자의 상황은 우리보다 훨씬 딱해 보이는군요. 우리는 그래도 인간과 말이라도 섞을 수 있지만 말이죠.

segments.text: The subculture movement has indeed changed the social status of some arcanists. While in the 1920s ... there are still many injustices.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 비주류 문화 운동이 정말로 일부 마도학자들의 사회적 지위를 바꿨어. 1920년대에는... 여전히 많은 불공평한 일들이 있지만.

segments.text: ... Mr. APPLe, how long will it take for the suitcase to be completely invisible?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...미스터 APPLe, 여행 가방이 완전히 모습을 감추려면 얼마나 더 있어야 하지?

segments.text: Thirty minutes. This APPLe is still waiting for the right solar altitude.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 30분입니다. 저 APPLe은 아직 적절한 태양의 고도를 기다리고 있어요.

segments.text: You can meet with Regulus first. This APPLe is afraid that in order to have some fun, she might ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 우선 레굴루스를 만나러 가세요. 저 APPLe은 재미를 위해서 그녀가 혹시...

segments.text: Ahem ... In order to relieve the boredom, she might make you troubles.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 크흠, 레굴루스가 답답함을 해소하다가 문제가 생길지 걱정됩니다.

segments.text: Okay.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 알겠습니다.

segments.text: Regulus?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스?

segments.text: There is only echo.
segments.translation: 오직 메아리만이 울려 퍼진다.

segments.text: And no sign of Regulus.
segments.translation: 그리고 레굴루스의 흔적은 어디에도 보이지 않았다.

segments.text: No one's here. The light is off. Did she go to another room?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아무도 없네. 불도 꺼져있고. 다른 방으로 간 건가?

segments.text: Someone is singing at the lake. The sound carries into the room faintly.
segments.translation: 호수에서 누군가 노래를 부르고 있다. 그 소리가 희미하게 방 안까지 들려온다.

segments.text: Haha ... ♪
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: Regulus! Why are you there?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스! 왜 거기 있어!

segments.text: The outside scenery keeps changing and changing …
segments.translation: 밖의 풍경이 계속해서 변하고 또 변한다…

segments.text: What has remained unchanged for ages is the lake and an old spinning wheel.
segments.translation: 오랜 세월 동안 변하지 않고 남아있는 것은 호수와 오래된 물레뿐이다.

segments.text: Her voice doesn't sound right.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 목소리를 들어보니 상태가 안 좋은 것 같네.

segments.text: I should go and take a look.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어서 가 봐야겠어.

segments.text: This is where Vertin has never been.
segments.translation: 이곳은 버틴이 한 번도 와본 적이 없는 곳이다.

segments.text: Regulus! Regulus!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 레굴루스! 레굴루스!

segments.text: I can't see her at all ... The fog is getting thicker …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 전혀 보이지 않아... 안개가 점점 짙어지고 있어...

segments.text: Vertin goes closer and finds half a spinning wheel in the middle of the lake, with strange threads on it.
segments.translation: 버틴이 가까이 다가가자 호수 한가운데에 물레 반쪽이 있고, 그 위에는 기이한 실들이 걸려 있는 것을 발견했다.

segments.text: ... The line is two-dimensional?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 선이 2차원이라고?

segments.text: The water rises.
segments.translation: 물이 차오른다.

segments.text: More and more water rises.
segments.translation: 물이 점점 더 많이 차오른다.

segments.text: The ground is covered with rainwater from the "Storm." Incredibly, the water has no weight, or humidity. It just flows slowly and quietly, like time.
segments.translation: 땅은 폭풍우로 인한 빗물로 뒤덮여 있다. 놀랍게도 그 물은 무게도, 습기도 없다. 그저 시간처럼 천천히 그리고 조용히 흘러갈 뿐이다.

segments.text: Time ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 시간이...

segments.text: I seem to have seen this ... It's ... I …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이걸 본 것 같은데... 이건... 나는...

segments.text: The line in her hand, technically the line-like thing in her hand which cannot be felt in any way, has gradually formed a path in her sight.
segments.translation: 그녀의 손에 있는 선, 정확히는 어떤 방식으로도 느낄 수 없는 선 같은 것이 그녀의 시야에서 점차 하나의 길을 형성하고 있었다.

segments.text: And someone is going to be invited over.
segments.translation: 그리고 누군가가 초대받게 될 것이다.

segments.text: ... Timekeeper?! Yes! Ahh, ahem, I ... I'm just thinking about how to find you.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 타임키퍼?! 네! 아, 아, 저는... 저는 지금 어떻게 당신을 찾을까 생각하고 있었어요.

segments.text: May I ask where is this place?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기가 어디인지 물어봐도 될까요?

segments.text: Did you use the advanced arcane skill "Aferoj Around," No. 000262603100008, to send me over?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 고급 마도술 아페로이 어라운드, 번호 000262603100008을 사용해서 저를 보내주신 건가요?

segments.text: No, it should not be this ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아니에요, 이럴 리가 없는데...

segments.text: Sonetto?! Why are ... Is it because I touched ... that line?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트?! 왜... 내가 그... 그 선을 건드려서 그런 거야?

segments.text: While Sonetto is immersed in the joy of the reunion, someone is snoring nearby.
segments.translation: 소네트가 재회의 기쁨에 빠져 있는 동안, 근처에서 누군가 코를 골고 있었다.

segments.text: The fog lifts and reveals Regulus. Now, she is sleeping soundly with a rock in her arms.
segments.translation: 안개가 걷히자 레굴루스의 모습이 드러났다. 그녀는 바위를 품에 안은 채 깊이 잠들어 있었다.

segments.text: Regulus?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 레굴루스?!

segments.text: Madam Z is right! She said Regulus was with you!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: Z 여사님 말씀이 맞았어요! 레굴루스가 당신과 함께 있다고 하시더라고요!

segments.text: What?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이럴 수가!

segments.text: Regulus, she ... Hmm? She seems to be asleep ... well ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 레굴루스는... 음? 잠든 것 같네요... 그럼...

segments.text: Umm ... I am also a bit like ... quite dizzy ...?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음... 저도 좀... 어지러워요...?

segments.text: Why did you all black out?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜 모두 정신을 잃었던 거야?

segments.text: What happened? I don't seem to be affected ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 무슨 일이야? 나는 별다른 영향을 받지 않은 것 같은데...

segments.text: On the lake, the spinning wheel is still shimmering.
segments.translation: 호수 위에서 물레가 여전히 반짝이고 있다.

segments.text: Hmm ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: I should come back and check again later.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나중에 다시 와서 확인해봐야겠어.

segments.text: The sound of water is left behind her.
segments.translation: 물소리가 그녀의 뒤편으로 사라져간다.

segments.text: Hmm ...
Indeed, this lake is surrounded by a mysterious fog. Mr. APPLe tries to figure it out, but almost falls into a coma.
segments.translation: 호수 부근에는 정체를 알 수 없는 안개가 짙게 퍼져 있었다. APPLe은 그 성분을 연구하던 중 하마터면 혼수상태에 빠질 뻔했다.

segments.text: The spinning wheel has been on standby for casting some arcane skill.
segments.translation: 물레는 어떤 마도술이 발동되기 전까지 대기 상태를 유지하고 있다.

segments.text: Ms. Vertin! They all wake up!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 버틴 씨! 다들 정신을 차렸어요!

segments.text: However ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 하지만...

segments.text: Sonetto found Regulus immediately ... They're at a standoff in the lobby.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트가 레굴루스를 그새 발견해서... 둘이 지금 응접실에서 대치 중입니다.

segments.text: I'm coming.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 바로 갈게.

segments.text: You are awake ... How do you feel? Any discomfort?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 깨어났구나... 기분은 어때? 어디 불편한 곳은 없고?

segments.text: Timekeeper ... you made it!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼... 역시 해내셨군요!

segments.text: I heard that you caught ... no, you gained the trust of Regulus ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신이 잡았... 아니, 레굴루스의 신임을 얻으셨다고 들었어요...

segments.text: When I returned to the research center, the committee informed me that Regulus would join the Foundation as our colleague.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 연구소로 돌아갔더니 위원회에서 레굴루스가 우리 재단의 일원이 될 거라고 하더군요.

segments.text: I am here to convey the committee's commendation and your next mission.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저는 당신에게 위원회의 임명장과 앞으로의 사명을 전하러 왔어요.

segments.text: I did not expect that you would just summon me ... In the future, if possible, I hope you could show me the incantation. I would also like to learn it!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그런데 저를 바로 소환해주실 줄이야... 나중에 기회가 된다면 주문을 알려주실 수 있을까요? 저도 배우고 싶어요!

segments.text: Regulus, we are very glad to have you!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 레굴루스, 당신이 와줘서 정말 기뻐요!

segments.text: However, you need to go to the Foundation and the Scientific Computing Center first to complete the registration process.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 일단 재단과 과학 연구소에 가서 관련 수속부터 진행하셔야 해요.

segments.text: As an arcanist talent rated S, we will provide you with the best equipment for scientific research.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: S급으로 평가받은 마도학자 인재로서, 과학 연구를 위한 최고의 장비를 제공해 드릴 거예요.

segments.text: Yes, it's a mistake. A bloody huge mistake!!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 맞아, 그건 오해야. 엄청난 오해라고!!

segments.text: Which star said she was ever going to join the Foundation? Ridiculous! Is this Pirate really so easily recruited?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 재단에 들어간다는 말은 대체 어느 별에서 들은 거야? 말도 안 돼! 이 해적님이 그렇게 쉽게 넘어갈 것 같아?

segments.text: Hey, congratulations for what!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐, 대체 뭐가 축하할 일이라는 거야!

segments.text: That wasn't the deal we made!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 약속했던 거랑 다르잖아!

segments.text: The institution Vertin told me is a place where the "Storm" can be avoided, free use of arcane skills is guaranteed, and Dr. Papper is even free for 365 days!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 버틴이 말한 기관은 폭풍우를 피할 수 있고, 마도술도 자유롭게 쓸 수 있게 해주면서, 닥터 페퍼까지 365일 무료로 제공하는 곳이라고!

segments.text: Exactly. If it is a place full of serious old men, Regulus must not be interested in it. Sorry for this APPLe's interruption.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 맞습니다. 무뚝뚝한 노인네들만 모아 놓은 곳이라면 레굴루스가 관심을 보일 리가 없죠. 죄송합니다. 저 APPLe이 제멋대로 끼어들었네요.

segments.text: What ...?! No, no no! The Foundation is definitely not a place for serious old men!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네...? 아니에요! 재단은 무뚝뚝한 노인네들만 모아 놓은 곳이 아니에요!

segments.text: That ... That's where Vertin and I grew up. And there are many other interesting people like us ... Ahem! Young people.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그곳은... 그곳은 버틴과 제가 자란 곳이에요. 그리고 저희 같은 흥미로운 사람들이 많이... 아, 아니! 젊은 사람들이 많이 있어요.

segments.text: Vertin, don't just stand there. Talk to them. Explain that.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 버틴, 그냥 서 있지만 말고 그들에게 말해주세요. 설명해주세요.

segments.text: Who knew Ms. Sonetto could be so panicked.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트 씨도 당황할 때가 있군요.

segments.text: Well, at least the Foundation is not that horrible at all.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그래도 재단이 그렇게 끔찍한 곳은 아닌 것 같네요.

segments.text: ... I should have more training.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 제가 아직 부족해서 그래요.

segments.text: Over shoes, over boots.
segments.translation: 이미 물에 빠진 김에 아예 끝까지 가보자.

segments.text: Let me explain. Regulus, APPLe, what I invited you to join before is ... the St. Pavlov Foundation.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation:
레굴루스, APPLe... 내가 설명할게.
내가 가입을 권했던 곳이 바로... 성 파블로프 재단이야.

segments.text: As for Dr. Papper, I think Sonetto will find a way.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 닥터 페퍼는 소네트가 해결 방법을 찾아줄 거야.

segments.text: ... I will definitely make an application to the administration.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 행정팀에 강력하게 요청해 볼게요.

segments.text: Fine. For the sake of 365 days of free drink, I'll join you.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그래. 365일 무한으로 마실 수 있다면야 받아주지.

segments.text: It shouldn't take too long to go through the procedures, right? I've got a bunch of belongings to pack up. Vertin, you ... come and help me!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 절차를 밟는 데 그렇게 오래 걸리지는 않겠지? 짐도 한가득 챙겨야 하고. 버틴, 너... 와서 도와줘!

segments.text: Three of them leave the room.
segments.translation: 세 사람이 방을 나간다.

segments.text: It shouldn't take long to go through the procedures, right? I've got a bunch of belongings to pack up. ... Vertin, you ... come and help me!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 절차 밟는 데 오래 걸리지 않을 거지? 짐도 한가득 챙겨야 하고... 버틴, 너... 와서 도와줘!

segments.text: Three of them left the room.
segments.translation: 세 사람이 방을 나갔다.

segments.text: I'm sorry ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미안해...

segments.text: Turns out the Foundation doesn't fully trust you. Just like you don't trust them.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 재단이 당신을 완전히 신뢰하는 것 같지는 않군요. 당신도 마찬가지고요.

segments.text: You acted privately without their knowledge, but they were still able to foresee the outcome.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 당신이 그들 몰래 사적으로 행동했지만, 그들은 여전히 그 결과를 예견할 수 있었던 거죠.

segments.text: If you don't mind, please tell us the stories from the past. After all, that's where our captain is leaving for.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 괜찮으시다면 과거의 이야기를 들려주세요. 어쨌든 그곳이 저희 캡틴이 떠나려는 곳이니까요.

segments.text: The Foundation is currently the charity that can provide the best treatment for arcanists. There is no doubt about it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재단은 현재 마도학자에게 최상의 대우를 해줄 수 있는 자선단체야. 그건 확실해.

segments.text: Every few years, the Foundation selects talented arcanists from children around the world.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재단에서는 몇 년마다 전 세계 아이들 중에서 재능 있는 마도학자들을 선발해.

segments.text: They go to orphanages and admonition centers, and even fish out unique ones from the prisons in detention centers.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고아원이나 교화소에 가기도 하고, 심지어 구치소 감옥에서 특별한 애들을 골라내기도 해.

segments.text: I was also one of them. Since I can remember, I know it very well that I am alone.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나도 그중 하나야. 기억이 시작된 순간부터 내가 혼자라는 걸 알고 있었어.

segments.text: Until 1999, when the first "Storm" came ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1999년에 첫 번째 폭풍우가 닥쳤을 때까지는...

segments.text: I ... I seem to see my mother.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나... 나의 어머니를 본 것 같아.

segments.text: So you have a mother!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 너한테 엄마가 있구나!

segments.text: ... I was not sure.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 확실하진 않아.

segments.text: All of us ... our memories of 1999 are blurred. I can only remember that she was placed on a laboratory bed, surrounded by many medical staff.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리 모두... 1999년도에 있었던 일이라 가물가물한데... 어머니가 의료진들에게 둘러싸인 채 실험용 침대에 누워 계시던 모습만 기억나.

segments.text: They shouted her name and mine. ... And I can't remember anything else. Later, no matter how hard I tried to ask, the official answer I got was always "No such person".
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사람들이 어머니와 나의 이름을 크게 외쳤었어... 그 외에는 전혀 기억이 안 나. 아무리 수소문해봐도 돌아오는 건 신원 확인 불가라는 답변뿐이었어.

segments.text: I have no intention to make enemies of the Foundation ... As I said, I just want to find out the truth ... all the truth about 1999.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재단을 적으로 돌릴 생각은 없어... 전에 말했던 것처럼 진실을 알고 싶을 뿐이야. 1999년에 관한 모든 진실 말이야.

segments.text: I know what you said to Sonetto just now is expedient. I can still help you get out of here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아까 소네트한테 말한 게 임시방편일 뿐이란 거 알아. 그래도 너희가 이곳을 빠져나갈 수 있도록 도와줄게.

segments.text: Think about it. If they can detect the whereabouts of the first one, then of course they can find the second and third. ... In that case, it never ends, does it?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 생각해봐. 첫 번째 걸 찾을 수 있다면, 당연히 두 번째, 세 번째도 찾을 수 있다는 거잖아. ... 그럼 끝이 없는 거 아냐?

segments.text: You can't send all your partners away!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 네 파트너들을 다 보낼 수도 없는 거잖아!

segments.text: So you mean ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그러니까 네 말은...

segments.text: Humph! I won't lose anything ... to go with you. Just don't forget the great kindness of the Pirate.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 흥! 너와 함께 간다고 해서... 내가 손해 볼 건 없어. 그냥 이 해적님의 큰 은혜를 잊지만 마.

segments.text: You betcha!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼!

segments.text: If I sneak away ... am I saying that I'm just a chicken ... a coward!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이렇게 도망 다니면... 겁쟁이라는 걸 인정하는 것뿐이잖아?

segments.text: Anyway, I've considered carefully. In this world, the "Storm" never stops. How could real "freedom" exist?!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어쨌든 나는 신중하게 생각해봤어. 이 세계에서는 폭풍우가 절대 멈추지 않아. 진정한 자유가 존재할 수 있겠어?!

segments.text: Since I would be inevitably "reversed" wherever I go,
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어디로 가든 결국 역류당할 수밖에 없으니까,

segments.text: By the way, you've got the best research devices ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그런데 최고급 연구 장비도 있고...

segments.text: Wow ha ha, it's gonna be so much fun! I have a lot of little things to study.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으하하, 너무 재밌을 것 같아! 연구하고 싶은 자잘한 것들이 많거든.

segments.text: Hmm, I see ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 알겠습니다...

segments.text: In that case, this APPLe respects the Captain's decision. In the current volatile situation, it is also more beneficial for us to join the official institution.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그렇다면 저 APPLe은 캡틴의 결정을 존중하겠습니다. 현재와 같이 불안정한 상황에서는 공식 기관에 합류하는 것이 우리에게도 더 유리하죠.

segments.text: The Foundation and we, after all, are not on the opposite sides in the first place.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 우리와 재단이 처음부터 대립하던 건 아닙니다.

segments.text: It's okay. Don't bother. Since you told me about the "Storm", I am more or less excited. ... Ahem!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 괜찮아. 신경 쓰지 마. 폭풍우에 대해 알게 되니 나도 관심이 좀 생기더라고... 엣헴!

segments.text: Then come back as soon as you finish the registration. The Foundation is open to public, but it's still heavily guarded.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 등록 끝나는 대로 바로 돌아와. 재단은 일반인에게 개방되어 있지만, 여전히 경비가 삼엄해.

segments.text: Indeed. Back in yesterday we were still wanted pirates ... We'll have to be careful on this trip.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 맞습니다. 어제까지만 해도 우린 해적과 탈주범 신분이었으니... 이번 일정은 신중하게 진행해야 해요.

segments.text: Huh? You don't have to go with me.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 응? 너는 안 와도 돼.

segments.text: I've actually got something very important for you to keep. Mr. APPLe, come here.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나 대신 중요한 물건도 맡아줘야 한단 말이야. 미스터 APPLe, 잠깐 나 좀 봐.

segments.text: ... Yes? Is there anything this APPLe could help with?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: ...왜 그러시죠? 저 APPLe이 도와드릴 일이라도 있습니까?

segments.text: Regulus and APPLe start whispering.
segments.translation: 레굴루스와 APPLe이 속삭이기 시작한다.

segments.text: Excuse me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 실례합니다.

segments.text: Could I talk to you for a second, Timekeeper?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 잠깐 얘기 좀 할 수 있을까요?

segments.text: I did not expect that there is such a big place in your suitcase. I never knew it before.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 가방 안에 이렇게 넓은 공간이 있을 줄은 몰랐어요. 전에는 전혀 몰랐거든요.

segments.text: So-sorry! I got carried away!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 죄-죄송해요! 너무 흥분했어요!

segments.text: You are right. I am very happy to be invited over.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그러게요. 그나저나 초대해 주셔서 정말 기뻤어요.

segments.text: I got promoted.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저 승진했어요.

segments.text: The committee recommended me ... to help you as the chief assistant.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 위원회의 추천으로... 당신의 제1조수를 맡게 되었어요.

segments.text: The scope of your responsibilities has also increased. You will be in charge of all the investigations on the "Storm" and Manus Vindictae. The authorities will provide us with assistance in all aspects.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신의 책임 범위도 늘어났어요. 앞으로 폭풍우와 재건의 손에 관한 모든 조사를 담당하게 될 거예요. 당국에서도 모든 면에서 저희에게 지원을 제공할 예정이고요.

segments.text: ... So, you have seen what the "Storm" was like?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 그러니까, 너도 폭풍우 당시의 상황을 봤다는 거네.

segments.text: The outside world ... is very different from what I thought.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 바깥 세계는... 제가 생각했던 것과 정말 달랐어요.

segments.text: As the Timekeeper, you've always carried such a secret for us. Thank you.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼로서 그동안 이런 비밀을 혼자 짊어지고 계셨다니... 고생 많으셨군요.

segments.text: Thank you for bringing the message, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트, 전해줘서 고마워.

segments.text: So, what's the first mission for our team?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 우리 팀의 첫 번째 임무는 뭐지?

segments.text: Please take a look.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 한번 보세요.

segments.text: According to the latest historical intelligence, there will be a massacre against arcanists in Chicago on February 14.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 최신 역사 정보에 따르면 2월 14일 시카고에서 마도학자들을 대상으로 한 학살이 일어날 예정이에요.

segments.text: We need to rescue the victims before human gangsters arrive at the underground parking.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 인간 갱단이 지하 차고에 도착하기 전에 우리가 먼저 가서 피해자들을 구출해야 돼요.

segments.text: Rescue the arcanists?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마도학자를 구출한다고?

segments.text: It doesn't conflict with the Foundation's purpose, right? Preventing confrontations between two races is also a way to defend the peace of mankind.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이게 재단의 설립 취지와 상충되는 건 아니지 않나요? 두 종족이 충돌하는 걸 막는 것 또한 인류 평화를 수호하는 방법 중 하나니까요.

segments.text: Although this is different from all the missions before.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여태까지 우리가 맡아 온 임무들과는 좀 다르긴 하지만,

segments.text: The authorities would probably want us to recruit new arcanists for the Foundation as much as possible.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재단은 우리가 새로운 마도학자 회원들을 모집해오길 바라는 거 같아요.

segments.text: I see.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠어.

segments.text: The forces of the Manus expand dramatically year by year. To stop the trend, we do need additional manpower.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 손 세력이 해마다 급격히 확장되고 있습니다. 이런 추세를 막으려면 추가 병력이 필요합니다.

segments.text: But ... Sonetto, did you have oranges just now? There is a scent of orange on the capsule.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그런데... 소네트, 혹시 오렌지 먹었어? 캡슐에서 오렌지 냄새가 나는데.

segments.text: How come? I did not. And ... I will definitely wash my hands after eating.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그럴 리가요? 먹은 적 없어요. 그리고... 전 음식을 먹은 뒤엔 꼭 손을 씻어요.

segments.text: Maybe that's my mistake. If there is no question, we are ready to go ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 착각한 건지도 모르지. 별다른 문제가 없다면 이제 출발하자...

segments.text: Whoa! You guys, come here and help!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으악! 빠, 빨리 나 좀 도와줘!

segments.text: It is ... Regulus's voice? Why is her voice coming from above ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이건... 레굴루스 목소린데? 왜 위에서 들리는 거지...

segments.text: Whoa!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우와!

segments.text: Our ... our suitcase is about to be moved by the critters!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 우리... 우리 여행 가방이 꼬마들한테 빼앗길 뻔했잖아!

segments.text: Ms. Vertin! Sonetto!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 버틴 씨, 소네트!

segments.text: Seems like our suitcase has disturbed some imps! Captain went out to check but got trapped!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 우리 여행 가방이 크리터 녀석들의 심기를 건드린 것 같습니다! 캡틴도 상황을 살피러 나갔다가 붙잡히고 말았어요.

segments.text: Captain, hang in there!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 캡틴, 좀만 버텨보세요!

segments.text: Even the tree hole is not safe enough ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 나무 구멍조차 충분히 안전하지 않군요...

segments.text: ... We should go. I will carry it with me along the way.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...이제 출발하자. 도착할 때까지 항상 지니고 있어야겠어.

segments.text: But Regulus ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 레굴루스는...

segments.text: Hm? What's that worried look?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 응? 왜 그렇게... 걱정스러운 눈빛으로 쳐다봐?

segments.text: Come on, Sonetto gave me a floppy disk. I'll reach the quarter 100% safe!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 걱정 마, 소네트한테 플로피 디스크를 받았으니까 안전하게 본부에 도착할 수 있을 거야!

segments.text: I know. It's not very often I've seen you like that.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 알았어, 네가 이런 표정을 짓다니 참 신기하네.

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 으으...

segments.text: I-I'm not there to fight!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 나, 난 싸우러 가는 거 아니거든!

segments.text: I gotta split then! This is a free trip. I'll definitely enjoy myself. Ha-ha! ♪
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 이제 가봐야겠어! 공짜 여행이잖아. 분명히 재밌게 놀 거야. 하하! ♪

segments.text: Let's get ready to move.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 출발 준비를 합시다.

segments.text: The mission is in the underground parking at No. 2122 Lincoln Park Street, two blocks away from us. We still have plenty of time ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 임무 장소는 링컨 파크 스트리트 2122번지 지하 주차장이에요. 우리에게서 두 블록 떨어진 곳이죠. 시간은 아직 충분해요...

segments.text: Can ... could we go there by bus?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저기... 버스로 가면 안 될까요?

segments.text: Oh ... it's so cold here. This APPLe is getting frosty.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 오... 여기 정말 춥네요. 저 APPLe이 얼어붙을 것 같아요.

segments.text: Really? I seem to feel nothing. It's actually kind of warm, compared to our routine training at low temperatures.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 정말요? 저는 아무것도 느끼지 못하겠는데요. 평소 저온에서 하는 훈련에 비하면 오히려 따뜻한 편이에요.

segments.text: According to the intelligence, now it's still one hour before the incident. Hmm ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 정보에 따르면 앞으로 사건 발생까지 한 시간 남았어요. 음...

segments.text: So this is the distance from the entrance to the wall, and here should also be marked ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그럼 입구에서 벽까지 거리, 그리고 여기에도 표시해둬야겠어요...

segments.text: What you're depicting in the air ... Is that the reconstruction of the victims' position?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 공중에 그리고 계신 것은... 피해자들의 위치를 재구성하는 건가요?

segments.text: Yes, I reconstructed to actual scale. In this way I can calculate the position that can provide cover without hindering us from joining the battle in time.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 실제 크기로 재현했어요. 이렇게 하면 우리가 제때 전투에 참여하는 데 방해가 되지 않으면서도 엄폐할 수 있는 위치를 계산할 수 있거든요.

segments.text: For anything that may cost others' lives, I want to be as cautious as possible. What if ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다른 사람의 생명과 연관되는 일이니 최대한 신중하고 싶어요. 만일...

segments.text: Huh. No, never mind. I am not worried about my own life. I am just ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하아, 아니에요. 제 목숨을 걱정하는 건 아니고, 그저...

segments.text: It's fine.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 괜찮아.

segments.text: They won't know.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다들 모를 거야.

segments.text: Shh ...! Someone's here. Two human drunks!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 쉿...! 누가 왔어요... 인간 주정꾼 두 명입니다!

segments.text: Don't let them wander around. It's too dangerous here! The gang fight will definitely hurt them.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 위험하니 이 근처에 얼씬도 못하게 해야 해요! 갱단 싸움에 말려들어 다칠지도 모르니까요.

segments.text: Skin damage: less than or equal to five millimeters. No visceral damage or psychube fluctuation found for the moment. Conclusion: the injuries meet the requirements of Emergency Defense Code of St. Pavlov Foundation.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 피부 손상: 5밀리미터 이하. 현재로서는 내장 손상이나 사이큐브 변동은 발견되지 않았습니다. 결론: 부상 정도가 성 파블로프 재단 긴급 방어 규정의 요건을 충족합니다.

segments.text: It will probably take some time for them to wake up. Hide them under the car first.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 깨어나려면 시간이 좀 걸릴 것 같네. 일단 차 밑에 숨겨두자.

segments.text: We don't have much time. Let's hurry to the hidden position. ... Mr. APPLe, why are you a little upset?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 시간이 많지 않아. 숨겨진 장소로 서둘러 가자. ...미스터 APPLe, 왜 조금 기분이 안 좋아 보여?

segments.text: ... This APPLe found a pack of sharpodonties in their pocket, and a child's finger ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: ... 저 APPLe은 주정꾼들의 주머니에서 톱니 동전 한 뭉치와 아이 손가락 하나를 발견했어요.

segments.text: ... Which are the currencies that only used by arcanists.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: ... 저건 마도학계 내에서만 유통되는 화폐입니다.

segments.text: Maybe ... that's just ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아마도... 그냥...

segments.text: It’s 1929, a year full of racial discrimination.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 지금 이곳은 1929년도입니다. 인종 차별이 심했던 시기죠.

segments.text: ... This is also the reason why we need to stop the next tragedy. For the peace of all mankind.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 우리가 앞으로 이 학살을 막아야만 하는 이유이기도 하죠. 인류의 평화를 위해서요.

segments.text: Outside the silent underground parking, a piercing sound of brakes cut through.
segments.translation: 조용한 지하 주차장 밖으로 날카로운 브레이크 소리가 울려 퍼졌다.

segments.text: There're still 30 minutes. Who's coming early ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아직 30분 남았는데, 누가 미리 온 건가...

segments.text: Pap, pap, pap.
segments.translation: 팝, 팝, 팝.

segments.text: Gunshots?! Wha ...? But the arcanists haven't got here ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 총소리?! 뭐지, 마도학자는 아직 안 왔는데!

segments.text: ... Damn it. Let's go!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 이런, 다들 따라와!

segments.text: How's it going?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어떻게 지내고 있어?

segments.text: James Clark.
segments.translation: 제임스 클락.

segments.text: Peter Gusenberg.
segments.translation: 피터 구센버그.

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Peter Gusenberg
segments.translation: 으으윽...

segments.text: Frank Gusenberg.
segments.translation: 프랭크 구센버그.

segments.text: Stop it!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: Why are you killing them?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 왜 저들을 죽이려고 하는 거지?!

segments.text: Because they want to kill the arcanists?
segments.translation: 녀석들이 마도학자를 죽이려고 하니까?

segments.text: Aren't you also here for this? Ms. Governors ... who know history very well.
segments.translation: 너희들도... 같은 이유로 온 거 아니야? 역사에 정통하신... 정부 나리들.

segments.text: So, next on the list is ... Adam Heyer.
segments.translation: 명단의 다음 사람은... 아담 헤이어네.

segments.text: Ah ... why can't I shoot her ... why ...!
segments.speaker: Adam Heyer
segments.translation: 아... 왜 그녀를 쏠 수가 없는 거야... 왜...!

segments.text: Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼!

segments.text: Be careful with her gun. Seems it is not our body that she is aiming at.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 저 총을 조심하세요, 우리 몸을 겨냥하고 있는 게 아닌 것 같군요!

segments.text: I got you. Please stand behind us. I will escort you to somewhere safe ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 괜찮아요. 저희 뒤로 와 계세요. 안전한 곳으로 모셔다 드릴게요...

segments.text: ... You guys are also arcanists?
segments.speaker: Adam Heyer
segments.translation: ... 너희들도 마도술사야?

segments.text: Ha ha ... Hahahaha ...! D******e!
segments.speaker: Adam Heyer
segments.translation: 하하... 하하하하...! 젠장!

segments.text: Pap.
segments.translation: 팝.

segments.text: Huh!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 엇!

segments.text: ... Kill ... he killed himself ...?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...자살이라니... 어떻게 자살을 할 수가...?!

segments.text: Carotid artery ruptures. We lost him.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 경동맥 파열이라 살릴 방법이 없습니다.

segments.text: What a pity. Is it because the arcanist's blood is so dirty ... that he would rather die than go with you?
segments.translation: 안타깝군. 마도학자의 피가 그렇게 더러워서... 너희들과 함께 가느니 차라리 죽는 걸 택한 건가?

segments.text: But life is precious. I ... do not want anyone to waste it ...
segments.translation: 하지만 생명은 고귀한 거야. 난 말이지 낭비하는 사람이 싫어.

segments.text: Enough.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그만둬.

segments.text: Those unconscious arcanists behind you ... are the original victims, right?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네 뒤에 있는 의식을 잃은 마도학자들... 원래 피해자들이 맞지?

segments.text: You are bringing them back to Manus Vindictae?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그들을 재건의 손에게 데려갈 생각인가?

segments.text: You ... are much more interesting than the stubborn old woman next to you.
segments.translation: 당신 말이야... 의외로 옆에 있는 꽉 막힌 아줌마보다 재미있는걸.

segments.text: You are also gorgeous ... Oh, your hair color is quite similar to the feather I like ... Ah ha, I'm getting excited.
segments.translation: 얼굴도 아름답고... 음, 머리 색깔도 내가 좋아하는 깃털이랑 비슷하구나... 아, 흥분되는 것 같아.

segments.text: Answer my question.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 말에 대답부터 해.

segments.text: Hmm ... hmm, that's harsh.
segments.translation: 흠... 흠, 그거 좀 심하네.

segments.text: We are just on to the same people. Before the "Storm," everyone wants more useful guys.
segments.translation: 같은 사람들을 노리고 있었을 뿐이야. 다들 폭풍우가 오기 전에 쓸 만한 사람들을 모으고 싶어 하니까.

segments.text: In that way, your destiny and mine ... are they now tightly connected?
segments.translation: 그렇다면 당신과 내 운명은... 이미 단단하게 결합해 있는 게 아닐까?

segments.text: None of the seven are alive ... How much do you hate humans that you could kill them like that?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 일곱 사람 모두 숨을 안 쉬어... 도대체 인간을 얼마나 증오하길래 이렇게까지 하는 거야!

segments.text: ... Hate humans?
segments.translation: ... 인간을 증오해?

segments.text: Then tell me ... in this massacre in history, who should be killed, human or arcanist?
segments.translation: 그럼 말해봐... 이 학살 사건에서 인간과 마도학자 중에 누가 죽었어야 했던 거지?

segments.text: ... Difference in talent is never, and never will be the reason to deprive people of life.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...재능의 차이는 결코, 그리고 앞으로도 절대 사람의 생명을 빼앗을 이유가 될 수 없어.

segments.text: Hum, bingo, Ms. Governor. Arcanist, or mortal ... I ... umm ... don’t really think it matters.
segments.translation: 음, 정답이야, 총독 양반. 마도학자든, 평범한 인간이든... 난... 음... 별로 상관없다고 생각해.

segments.text: As long as we survive, it's all good.
segments.translation: 살아남기만 하면 다행이니까.

segments.text: What's in the shadow ...? She's holding a ritual? Stop her! She is going to take those arcanists away!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그림자 속에 뭐가...? 의식을 치르고 있는 건가요? 막아야 해요! 저 마도학자들을 데려가려고 하고 있어요!

segments.text: Umm. Although I like you very much, I still have to finish my task ...
segments.translation: 음, 당신이 마음에 들긴 하지만, 나도 임무는 완수해야 하니까...

segments.text: This is the reward for killing Adam for me. Don't forget me.
segments.translation: 이건 나 대신 아담을 죽인 대가야~ 날 기억해줘.

segments.text: That's it? She's gone? What are these ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이렇게... 가버리다니? 바닥에 흘린 이것들은...

segments.text: Stock gift agreement?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 주식 증여 계약서?

segments.text: She even left us stolen goods?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 심지어 우리에게 훔친 물건까지 버리고 가다니?

segments.text: Don't worry. I will deal with them right now.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마세요. 제가 바로 처리할게요.

segments.text: Wait.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 잠깐.

segments.text: There's an address on the seal—Polypotion Bar, The Walden.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 계약서 날인에 주소가 있어... 복합 조제 포션 바, 월든

segments.text: Sonetto, update the result to the headquarters.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트, 본부에 이번 작전의 결과를 보고해 줘.

segments.text: Roger that. And we ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 그럼 우리는...

segments.text: Let's move on to the next destination.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우선 다음 목적지로 이동한다.

segments.text: The Walden ... It may have the answer to all the questions.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 월든"... 어쩌면 그곳에 모든 의문에 대한 해답이 있을지도 몰라.

segments.text: Umm huh. The last human ... You saved him?
segments.translation: 음, 딱 하나 남은 인간인데... 너희들이 구해버렸네.

segments.text: It would be our honor to have the young lady's presence at The Walden.
segments.translation: 댁의 아가씨께서 월든에 기꺼이 왕림해 주시다니 참으로 영광입니다.

segments.text: Thanks to your kindness last time, we were able to invent the new potion before the National Prohibition Act was enacted. Of course, I will deliver what you had purposed on time.
segments.translation: 지난번에 신경 써주신 덕에 새로운 금주 법안이 통과되기 전, 포션을 개발해낼 수 있었습니다. 물론 제시하신 대로 기한 맞춰 보내드리겠습니다.

segments.text: Yes, everything is fine ... No, you don't have to worry too much about Congress.
segments.translation: 네, 요즘은 괜찮습니다... 아닙니다, 의회 쪽은 너무 염려 마세요.

segments.text: You need to trust them.
segments.translation: 그들을 믿어야 해요.

segments.text: Humans, they talk the talk and don't walk the walk, but they're more likely to vote for the side that seems more ethical.
segments.translation: 사람들은 겉과 속이 다르긴 하지만, 다들 더 도덕적으로 보이는 쪽에 표를 주고 싶어 하죠.

segments.text: Please be rest assured. We will make the young lady's day a pleasant one.
segments.translation: 안심하세요. 아가씨께서 기분 좋은 하루를 보내실 수 있게 해드리죠.

segments.text: Hmm ... it's good weather.
segments.translation: 음... 날씨가 참 좋군.

segments.text: And ideal for an impressive "Storm."
segments.translation: 인상적인 폭풍우를 맞이하기 좋겠어.

segments.text: According to Louise Strong's column on New Yorker on February 5, Duke Ellington's jazz orchestra will perform at The Walden tonight!
segments.translation: 뉴요커지 루이 스트롱의 2월 5일 칼럼에 따르면, 엘링턴 공작의 재즈 관현악단이 오늘 밤 월든에서 공연한다고 합니다!

segments.text: It will be the best ever! Wild! Rhythmic! Fancy! Just what a jazz band should be ...
segments.translation: 전례없이 좋은 소식이야! 야성적이고! 리듬도 있고! 게다가 화려하기까지! 이게 바로 재즈 밴드가 갖춰야 할 모습이라고!

segments.text: There you go, Ms. Sotheby. There's no need to deliberately read that aloud.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 그렇지, 소테비 양. 굳이 그걸 소리 내서 읽을 필요는 없어.

segments.text: Master in England has given you the permission to go out. Also, I've spoken to the owner of The Walden on the phone …
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 영국에 계신 주인님께서 외출 허가를 내려주셨습니다. 그리고 월든 호텔 사장과도 전화로 이야기를 나눴는데…

segments.text: Hooray!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 야호!

segments.text: Hooray? That's not what a young lady should say.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 만세라고? 젊은 숙녀가 할 말이 아니군요.

segments.text: Mr. Karson, Sotheby has grown up.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨, 소더비는 이제 다 컸어요.

segments.text: And I am not going out to play this time. I also have the great mission of saving people.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그리고 이번엔 놀러 나가는 게 아니야. 사람들을 구한다는 중대한 사명도 있거든.

segments.text: Fine, fine. Just don't go hawking your new nutrient potions. Ms. Moissan would be worried if she saw you come back disappointed.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 좋아, 좋아. 그냥 새로 만든 영양 포션을 팔러 다니지는 마라. 실망해서 돌아오는 모습을 보면 무아상 씨가 걱정하실 테니까.

segments.text: ... Then I'm leaving!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: ... 그럼 나 간다!

segments.text: Wrong way, my lady. The car is at the front door.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 잘못된 길이에요, 아가씨. 차는 정문에 있습니다.

segments.text: Huh! I-I don't need a bodyguard! You promised I could go out alone this time!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 헉! 나-나는 경호원 같은 거 필요 없어! 이번엔 혼자 나가도 된다고 약속했잖아!

segments.text: Mind your manners, my lady. There isn't a bodyguard there for you this time.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 예의를 지키시죠, 아가씨. 이번엔 당신을 지켜줄 경호원이 없으니까요.

segments.text: The wood near the bar is quite dangerous. We must pick you up in person for peace of mind.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 술집 근처 숲은 꽤 위험합니다. 안심하려면 저희가 직접 모시러 가야겠어요.

segments.text: In brief, after entering the bar, staff will lead you to your seat.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 간단히 말하면, 바에 들어가시면 직원이 자리로 안내해 드릴 겁니다.

segments.text: Remember, watching only. No alcoholic or incitant potion drinks. Do not talk to strangers. Black bottom is not allowed …
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 기억해, 구경만 하는 거야. 술이나 흥분제 물약은 안 돼. 모르는 사람과 말하지 말고. 검은 바닥은 금지고...

segments.text: Hmm? My lady?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 음? 아가씨?

segments.text: I! Got! It!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 내가! 해냈어!

segments.text: Creaking ... Creaking ...
segments.translation: 끼익... 끼익...

segments.text: The woods ... so gloomy.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 숲은... 음산하네요.

segments.text: All the plants are dead. There is no evidence of life at all. Even the bark on the branches are charred.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 식물이 전부 죽어서 생기가 조금도 느껴지지 않아요. 나무줄기는 껍질까지 새까맣게 말라버렸어요.

segments.text: Looks like it has been through a huge fire.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 마치 큰 산불이 할퀴고 지나간 것처럼 보이네요.

segments.text: Well, if it were not the path we must take, I really don't want to enter this woods ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음, 반드시 지나가야 하는 게 아니었다면, 이 숲에는 절대 안 들어왔을 거예요...

segments.text: Speaking of which, Sonetto, have you ever heard of a ghost story about "fire"?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그런데 소네트, 혹시 불에 관한 괴담 이야기 들어본 적 있어?

segments.text: No. Never.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아뇨, 못 들어봤어요.

segments.text: Oh. So it is said that in the early 20th century, there was a devastating forest fire in Washington.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아. 20세기 초에 워싱턴에서 큰 산불이 났다고 하더라.

segments.text: Those who died unfortunately did not want to leave, and they turned into dark ghosts in the woods.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 불행하게 죽은 자들은 떠나고 싶어 하지 않았고, 숲 속의 어둠의 유령이 되어버렸어.

segments.text: Um …
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: They follow the travelers without making any sounds, and in order to see everyone's face clearly, they will …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그들은 소리 없이 여행자들을 따라다니고, 모든 사람의 얼굴을 똑똑히 보기 위해서...

segments.text: Ah! I can't hear you clearly ... It's too noisy walking on these dried leaves. All I heard is the whizzing sound behind me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아! 잘 안 들려요... 이 마른 낙엽을 밟고 걸으니까 너무 시끄러워요. 뒤에서 휙휙거리는 소리만 들렸어요.

segments.text: True, this APPLe heard some loud noise, too.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 맞아요, 이 APPLe도 큰 소음을 들었거든요.

segments.text: ... Umm? Mr. APPLe, why are you in front of me? Then ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...응? 미스터 APPLe, 왜 제 앞에 있죠? 그럼…

segments.text: Ahh! Gho-ghost ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 악! 유, 유령이다!

segments.text: Lots of unknown creatures! Sonetto, stay behind me!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다수의 미확인 생명체 확인. 소네트, 어서 내 뒤로 와!

segments.text: Everybody, get ready to fight!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 모두, 전투 준비해!

segments.text: Sss!
segments.speaker: Critters
segments.translation: 쉿!

segments.text: No, too many of them. We can only take one round at most, not for long.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 되겠어, 수가 너무 많아. 앞으로 한 번 정도는 더 막아낼 수 있지만, 얼마 못 버틸 것 같아.

segments.text: Critters keep coming from the roots. Are they living here?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 크리터가 나무뿌리에서 계속 나오는 군요... 여기가 혹시 아지트일까요?

segments.text: Coming again. Careful!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 또 나왔어. 조심해!

segments.text: Timekeeper, did you see my mark on the map?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 제가 지도에 표시해둔 것을 보셨나요?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: According to my calculation, that's the closest position to the edge of the woods.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제가 계산해낸 숲 가장자리까지 가장 가까운 위치예요.

segments.text: In one minute, I'll cover you to move in the opposite direction! Remember, there's a slope two miles away that can slow down the critters.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 1분 뒤 반대쪽으로 가실 수 있도록 엄호할게요! 명심하세요, 2마일 떨어진 곳에 크리터의 추격 속도를 늦출 수 있는 경사가 있어요!

segments.text: Ms. Sonetto, aren't you coming with us?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 저희랑 같이 가지 않으실 겁니까?

segments.text: Suppressed by such an overwhelming number, we can't get out!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 정도 규모의 적이면 우리 모두 도망가는 건 불가능해요!

segments.text: Don't worry. The action strategy would be more flexible if there's only me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정 마세요, 단독으로 움직이는 전략이 더 유연하게 대처할 수 있으니까요.

segments.text: As long as the enemies are not ghosts ... no, even if they are ghosts, I will survive.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 적들이 유령만 아니라면... 아니, 유령이라고 해도 저는 살아남을 거예요.

segments.text: Please trust me. Just like ... how we used to be.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 믿어주세요. 전에... 같이 힘을 합쳤을 때처럼요.

segments.text: I will always find you. Please retreat quickly.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제가 알아서 당신을 찾아갈게요. 어서 후퇴하세요.

segments.text: Let's go, Mr. APPLe.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가자, 미스터 APPLe.

segments.text: May the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 평화가 우리와 함께하길.

segments.text: They are all coming for us!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 녀석들이... 전부 쫓아오고 있어요...!

segments.text: ... It's a good thing.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 잘 됐군.

segments.text: Maybe we covered Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어쩌면 우리가 소네트를 엄호한 걸지도.

segments.text: As long as one of us can leave the woods, there's hope for the rest.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리 중 누구든 이 숲에서 빠져나간다면, 나머지에게도 희망이 있어.

segments.text: Too late to climb up the slope. Get ready to fight!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 경사를 오르긴 늦었어. 정면충돌에 대비해!

segments.text: Mr. APPLe, how much longer can you hold on?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미스터 APPLe, 얼마나 더 버틸 수 있지?

segments.text: Though it may not sound like what an apple should say ... this APPLe will fight with you to the last moment!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그다지 사과가 할 말은 아니지만... 저 APPLe은 당신과 함께 최후의 순간까지 맞서 싸우겠습니다!

segments.text: Vertin, look out!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 버틴, 조심해요!

segments.text: Hmm?
segments.translation: 음?

segments.text: No offense.
segments.translation: 악의는 없어요.

segments.text: Would you please pass me my heel?
segments.translation: 제 신발 좀 건네주시겠어요?

segments.text: It seems to have fallen into your arms.
segments.translation: 너희 품에 떨어진 것 같네.

segments.text: I am Druvis III, the owner of the woods.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나는 드루비스 3세, 이 숲의 주인이다.

segments.text: This is my promised land.
segments.translation: 여기가 제게 허락된 곳이거든요.

segments.text: I am Druvis III. It's my pleasure to meet you.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 저는 드루비스 3세입니다. 만나서 반갑습니다.

segments.text: ... The heels ... here you are.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 발뒤꿈치... 여기 있구나.

segments.text: Thank you. Then I will come down and clean up the mess.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 고마워. 그럼 내려가서 정리하도록 할게.

segments.text: It's fine to land barefoot. However ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 맨발로 착지해도 괜찮아. 하지만...

segments.text: I don't like touching them directly ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 직접 만지는 건 별로 안 좋아해...

segments.text: ... These invaders.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 이 침입자들.

segments.text: She beats hundreds of them with one single move?! Is it the power of her wand ...?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 한 번에 적을 백 명도 넘게 쓰러뜨리다니?! 완드의 힘인가...

segments.text: No, the arcane circle she cast is pretty archaic. She must have a European arcanum background.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 아니에요, 그녀가 그린 마도진은 꽤 고전적이네요. 유럽 마도학 배경을 가지고 있는 게 틀림없어요.

segments.text: It has been a long time since I saw the arcanist visitors.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 마도술사 방문객들을 본 지 정말 오래됐군.

segments.text: Thank you for helping me expel the critters. Then, as for the ones left ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 해충들을 쫓아내는 걸 도와줘서 고마워. 그럼, 남은 놈들은...

segments.text: Just as the woods prophesy in whisper—invaders, you shall offer your sacrifice for the peace.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲이 속삭이며 예언하는 바와 같이—침입자들아, 너희는 평화를 위해 제물을 바쳐야 할 것이다.

segments.text: Please allow us to assist you!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저희가 도와드리겠습니다!

segments.text: Finally, we are safe now.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 드디어 끝났군요... 이젠 안전해요.

segments.text: Thank you very much for your help, Ms. Druvis.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 도와줘서 정말 고마웠어, 드루비스 씨.

segments.text: You ran a long way into the woods. Are you looking for the girl with orange hair?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲 깊숙이 한참을 달려왔군. 주황색 머리의 소녀를 찾고 있는 건가?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: I "see" her get rid of the critters, and take a dark green Bentley to the northwest.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그 여자가 벌레들을 처리하고 짙은 녹색 벤틀리를 타고 북서쪽으로 가는 걸 봤어.

segments.text: The woods know where the visitors go, leading them astray, or to the light.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲은 방문자들이 어디로 가는지 알고 있어. 그들을 길에서 벗어나게 하거나, 빛으로 인도하지.

segments.text: And your friend, she has good fortune.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그리고 자네 친구는 운이 좋군.

segments.text: The exit on the northwest ... It's quite close to The Walden on the map.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 북서쪽 출구... 지도상으로는 월든과 꽤 가깝군.

segments.text: The Walden?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 월든?

segments.text: Now I see. You are also here for the Storm Gathering tonight.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 이제 알겠군. 당신도 오늘 밤 폭풍우 집회 때문에 온 거로군.

segments.text: What is the Storm Gathering?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우 집회가 뭐지?

segments.text: It is a gathering of elite arcanists from all states. Besides, celebrities and frequenters familiar with the barkeeper are also invited.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 각 주의 엘리트 마도술사들이 모이는 자리야. 게다가 바텐더와 친분이 있는 유명인사들과 단골손님들도 초대받았고.

segments.text: I think ... there will be the regular duel performances, a banquet that is too noisy, and the announcement of "good news."
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 아마도... 정례 결투 공연들과, 너무 시끄러운 연회, 그리고 좋은 소식의 발표가 있을 거야.

segments.text: Do you know what exactly the "good news" is, Ms. Druvis?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 좋은 소식이 자세히 뭔지 아십니까? 드루비스 씨.

segments.text: My apologies. I am not interested in that.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 죄송하지만, 그런 건 관심 없어요.

segments.text: Hmm ... but if you want to know the "good news," you might as well take my invitation and take a look.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 흠... 하지만 좋은 소식이 뭔지 알고 싶다면, 내 초대를 받아들여서 직접 확인해 보는 게 어때.

segments.text: This is a secret gathering in a speakeasy. It's by invitation only ... and a stock coupon of at least 50,000 dollars is needed.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 여기는 은밀한 지하 술집 모임이야. 초대받은 사람만 올 수 있고... 최소 5만 달러 상당의 주식 쿠폰이 필요해.

segments.text: Stock? Why does it always have something to do with financial securities ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 주식? 왜 항상 금융 증권과 관련이 있는 거지...

segments.text: We had a subscription agreement before, but ... it was burned by our friend ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 원래 증여 계약서가 한 통 있었어요. 그런데... 우리 친구가 태워버렸죠...

segments.text: ... That's all right. But you can actually get here with nothing.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 괜찮아. 하지만 정말 아무것도 없이 여기까지 올 수 있구나.

segments.text: "Stock prices have reached what looks like a permanently high plateau." Have you heard about this?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 주가가 영구적으로 높은 수준에 도달한 것 같다." 이런 말 들어본 적 있어?

segments.text: Nowadays, cash is not used for transactions. The application of arcanum has made stock exchange surprisingly convenient.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 요즘엔 거래에 현금을 쓰지 않아. 마도술의 응용으로 주식 거래가 놀랍도록 편리해졌거든.

segments.text: The urban agglomerations expand rapidly in the new era, and even the critters have lost their home. Only loans and the infinitely soaring stock market could satisfy such a huge desire.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 신시대에 도시 집적지들이 급속도로 확장되면서, 작은 생물들조차 보금자리를 잃었다. 오직 대출과 끝없이 치솟는 주식시장만이 그런 거대한 욕망을 만족시킬 수 있을 뿐이지.

segments.text: It is similar to the history this APPLe knows, but sounds a little different ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 저 APPLe이 알고 있는 역사와 비슷하지만, 조금 다르게 들리는군요...

segments.text: ... This is the Gift Agreement for the 50,000 US dollars coupon. If you're still going to the gathering, take it with you.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 이건 5만 달러 쿠폰에 대한 증여 계약서야. 아직도 그 모임에 갈 거라면, 가져가.

segments.text: You are not going?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가지 않을 건가?

segments.text: Thank you for asking, but I ... do not want to leave the woods for now.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 물어봐 줘서 고마워. 하지만 난... 지금은 숲을 떠나고 싶지 않아.

segments.text: Hello, I am your personal stockbroker. Your grantee application has been received ... Application approved ... Account updated.
segments.speaker: Stockbroker
segments.translation: 안녕하세요, 저는 당신의 전담 주식 중개인입니다. 수혜자 신청서가 접수되었습니다... 신청 승인... 계정이 업데이트되었습니다.

segments.text: Thank you for your support to blue-chip stock.
segments.speaker: Stockbroker
segments.translation: 우량주에 대한 지원에 감사드립니다.

segments.text: The real estate market is on fire today. Now we have customized recommendations for you …
segments.speaker: Stockbroker
segments.translation: 오늘 부동산 시장이 정말 뜨겁네요. 이제 당신을 위한 맞춤형 추천 상품들을 준비했습니다...

segments.text: We're good, thank you.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 사양하죠, 감사합니다.

segments.text: The exit of the woods is at the end of the road, next to the three cypresses. I will leave you here then. May the woods bless you with fortune.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲의 출구는 길 끝에 있어, 세 그루의 사이프러스 나무 옆이야. 여기서 작별하겠어. 숲이 너에게 행운을 가져다주길.

segments.text: And ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그리고...

segments.text: ... If you see the barkeeper, please send him my best regards.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 바텐더를 보게 되면, 안부 좀 전해주세요.

segments.text: And ... If you see the barkeeper, please send him my best regards.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그리고... 바텐더를 보시게 되면, 안부 좀 전해주세요.

segments.text: Lord Forget Me Not, you had a good day.
segments.translation: 포겟미낫 마스터, 오늘 참 좋아 보이네요.

segments.text: The men I need, have you brought them back?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 내가 필요한 사람들, 데려왔나?

segments.text: M-hmm ... Seven arcanists, not even missing a single cutie finger.
segments.translation: 으음... 마도학자 7명 말이죠. 앙증맞은 손가락까지 조금도 빠트리지 않고 챙겨왔답니다.

segments.text: They are all very interested in the doctrine of the Manus. Soon, they will become your devout desperados.
segments.translation: 그들은 모두 재건의 손의 교리에 매우 관심이 많아. 곧 너의 충실한 무법자들이 될 거야.

segments.text: I did my job so perfectly. What rewards will there be for me? Heh heh.
segments.translation: 맡은 임무를 이렇게 멋지게 해냈으니... 어떤 보너스가 있을지 기대되네요, 호호호.

segments.text: I heard that you didn't take care of the redundancies.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 중복 처리를 제대로 안 했다고 들었는데.

segments.text: Hmm, I don't really remember ... in the mission, there are instructions to kill civilians.
segments.translation: 으음... 기억이 잘 안 나는데... 임무에 민간인을 죽이라는 지시가 있었나요.

segments.text: Or say ... for you, the arcanists who are not pure-blooded are just worthless? Heh Heh.
segments.translation: 아니면... 당신들에겐 순수 혈통이 아닌 마도학자는 아무런 가치도 없다는 뜻인가요? 호호.

segments.text: Even if we are from a southern mafia, we do care about brotherhood. We can't be as ruthless as the "Storm."
segments.translation: 우리가 남부 갱단 출신이긴 하지만 의리는 있거든요... 폭풍우처럼 매몰차게 그러면 안 되죠...

segments.text: For the special ones, of course we Manus will make exceptions. Just like now, we are still searching for your missing sister, Schneider.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 특별한 존재들에게는 당연히 우리 재건의 손도 예외를 둡니다. 지금처럼 말이죠, 우리는 여전히 당신의 실종된 여동생 슈나이더를 찾고 있으니까요.

segments.text: Thank you for being considerate.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 배려해줘서 고마워.

segments.text: She strolls lazily towards the door.
segments.translation: 그녀는 느긋하게 문 쪽으로 걸어간다.

segments.text: Your stepsister Marian must be extremely touched if she knows how much you value her.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 의붓언니 마리안이 네가 자신을 얼마나 소중히 여기는지 안다면 정말 감동받을 거야.

segments.text: You were adopted by the Grecos after all. It's not like you are related to those ... humans by blood.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어쨌든 넌 그레코 가문에 입양된 거잖아. 그 ... 인간들과 혈연관계가 있는 것도 아니고 말이야.

segments.text: No matter what, we are "families" and have lived together for more than ten years.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 어쨌든 우리는 가족이고, 십 년도 넘게 함께 살아왔잖아.

segments.text: Thank you for caring so much about Marian.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 마리안을 그렇게 걱정해 줘서 고마워.

segments.text: Although I think I’ve never mentioned ... which sister is missing.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 생각해보니... 어느 쪽 언니가 실종된 건지는 말한 적이 없었네.

segments.text: Thank you for caring so much about Marian. Although I think I’ve never mentioned ... which sister is missing.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 마리안을 그렇게 걱정해줘서 고마워. 그런데 내가... 어느 쪽 언니가 실종됐는지는 말한 적이 없는 것 같은데.

segments.text: Mamma.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 엄마.

segments.text: Mamma, pack up. Let's leave tonight.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 엄마, 짐 싸요. 오늘 밤에 떠나요.

segments.text: Hello. Please get me Madam Z of St. Pavlov Foundation Committee.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여보세요. 성 파블로프 재단 위원회의 Z 씨 좀 부탁합니다.

segments.text: Hmm. It's you. What's wrong?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 음, 자네군. 무슨 일이지?

segments.text: I require access to the historical intelligence on the U.S. financial market in 1929, specifically the date of the Wall Street stock market crash, and how much arcanum was involved in the methods of stock exchange.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1929년 미국 금융 시장의 역사적 정보에 접근이 필요해. 특히 월스트리트 주식시장 대폭락 날짜와, 주식 거래 방식에 마도술이 얼마나 관여했는지 말이야.

segments.text: Anything else?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 또 다른 일이 있나?

segments.text: ... Also, I request sending backup to reinforce the Storm Gathering tonight. Casual wear required.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 그리고 오늘 밤 폭풍우 집회에 대한 추가 병력을 요청합니다. 반드시 평상복 차림이어야 하고요.

segments.text: The date of the 1929 Crash confirmed by primary sources is Thursday, October 24. And the decline happened again, on the 28th and 29th.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 1차 사료로 확인된 1929년 대폭락의 날짜는 10월 24일 목요일이야. 그리고 28일과 29일에 다시 하락이 일어났지.

segments.text: Intelligence Division indicates that no arcane forces were involved.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 부서의 정보에 따르면 이 사건에는 마도학계 세력이 개입하지 않았군.

segments.text: Hmm ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: The Manus is changing history, Madam Z.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건이 역사를 바꾸고 있습니다, Z 부인.

segments.text: I'll send you a special team and give you the highest command.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 자네에게 특수 부대와 최고 지휘권을 주도록 하지.

segments.text: Do not make any moves until you figure out the reason why they want to change the history.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그들이 역사를 바꾸려는 이유를 확실히 밝히기 전까지는 어떤 행동도 취하지 말도록.

segments.text: Copy that.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠습니다.

segments.text: Sounds like your friend just got into some troubles, Regulus.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 자네 친구한테 작은 문제가 생긴 것 같군, 레굴루스.

segments.text: I'd say, sign these documents and that's all for me, right? And then to the office of Scientific Computing Center?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그러니까 이 서류들에 서명하면 내 볼일은 다 끝나는 거지? 이제 과학 연구소의 사무소로 가면 되는 건가?

segments.text: That's right. Let me show you the way, Regulus.
segments.translation: 맞아. 내가 길을 안내해줄게, 레굴루스.

segments.text: En. This is X, our mechanical scientist. He will introduce you to some of our research devices ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 음, 이쪽은 우리의 기계 과학자 X일세. 마침 우리가 가진 과학 연구 설비들을 소개해줄 수 있겠군...

segments.text: Although you are known for your rock and roll, I've heard that you're also interested in human technology.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 자넨 로큰롤로 유명하지만, 인간의 과학 기술에도 관심이 많다고 들었어.

segments.text: Oh I got it. I don’t need to introduce myself then. Just call me Captain R!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 아, 그렇구나. 그럼 내 소개는 생략해도 되겠네, 앞으로 날 캡틴 R이라고 불러!

segments.text: Heh heh. That's not what our names come from.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 하하... 저희 이름은 그런 의미가 아니에요.

segments.text: Follow me, friend from afar. I have a lot of interesting new things to show you.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 먼 곳에서 온 친구, 절 따라오세요. 같이 얘기해보고 싶은 신기하고 재미난 것들이 많거든요.

segments.text: The office is the only branch of the Scientific Computing Center affiliated with the Foundation. So, only the paper materials can be shared.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 사무소는 재단 산하인 과학 연구소의 유일한 지부입니다. 그래서 공유할 수 있는 거라곤 이렇게 지면으로 된 연구개발 자료뿐이죠.

segments.text: Hey! Why do you stop! I almost hit you.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐! 왜 갑자기 멈추는데? 부딪힐 뻔했잖아!

segments.text: The introduction of the Scientific Computing Center is over, and your sightseeing tour ends here.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 과학 연구소의 관련 자료 공유는 이만하죠. 관광도 이쯤에서 마무리하고요.

segments.text: Would you like to know something more interesting?
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 더 재미있는 걸 알고 싶으시죠?

segments.text: For example ... the truth of the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 예를 들어... 폭풍우에 관한 진실 같은 거?

segments.text: ... What do you know?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: ... 넌 뭘 알고 있지?

segments.text: Not me. It's we. We're from a secret institution inside the Scientific Computing Center—Institutum Lorentz.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 제가 아니라 저희죠. 과학 연구소 내부 기관인... 로렌츠 연구소라고 합니다.

segments.text: We are the ones who invited you to visit the Scientific Computing Center. Although you didn't bring the "little thing" with you, I believe it's still necessary for us to know each other.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 과학 연산 센터 견학을 제안한 건 저희입니다. 그 작은 것을 가져오지 않으셨지만, 그래도 저희끼리 서로 알아가는 시간이 필요하다고 생각해요.

segments.text: Humph. So, it seems everyone of the Foundation is an intelligence expert.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 흥. 재단 놈들은 하나같이 다 정보통이구만.

segments.text: We are not part of the Foundation, not even part of the Scientific Computing Center.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 저희는 재단 소속이 아니에요...과학 연구소 소속도 아니죠.

segments.text: Unlike the Manus rioters who attacked you for your "little thing" ...
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 작은 물건을 위해 당신에게 달려드는 재건 폭도들과는 달라요...

segments.text: We are only interested in the arcanists who are curious and inquisitive. Everything else has nothing to do with us. To better understand the "Storm," Lorentz needs more talented collaborators.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 저희는 호기심이 많고 탐구정신이 있는 마도사들에게만 관심이 있어요. 그 외의 것들은 저희와 상관없고요. 폭풍우를 더 잘 이해하기 위해서는 로렌츠에 재능 있는 협력자들이 더 필요하거든요.

segments.text: So, does the door in front of us lead to your secret base?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그래서, 우리 앞에 있는 저 문이 너희 비밀 기지로 통하는 거야?

segments.text: For now, yes.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 현재로선 그렇습니다.

segments.text: I can't see anything inside.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 안에 뭐가 있는지 하나도 안 보이는데.

segments.text: Vertin and Sonetto, what are they doing now ...
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 버틴이랑 소네트는 지금 뭐 하고 있을까...

segments.text: Dear Freddy, could you make the "Auto Island" move faster? Our Ms. Sonetto has something really urgent!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 프레디, 오토 아일랜드를 좀 더 빠르게 움직일 수 있을까요? 우리 소네트 씨에게 정말 급한 일이 있거든요!

segments.text: Miss, we cannot speed up anymore. Mr. Karson will be mad if we race in the woods.
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 아가씨, 더 이상 속도를 낼 수 없어요. 숲에서 이렇게 달리면 카슨 씨가 화내실 거예요.

segments.text: Oh ... then how long will it take to The Walden?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아... 그럼 월든까지는 얼마나 걸려?

segments.text: Probably ... half an hour.
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 아마... 30분 정도요.

segments.text: Oh my ... it's too long! We promised Ms. Sonetto to find her friends, right?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어머... 너무 오래 걸렸네! 소네트 씨의 친구들을 찾아주기로 약속했잖아, 맞지?

segments.text: We keep going slowly, we will miss Ms. Vertin!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이렇게 천천히 가다가는 버틴 씨를 놓치겠어요!

segments.text: Fine. Freddy. Quick. Drink it!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 좋아. 프레디. 빨리. 마셔!

segments.text: It's the "Bravery Charging Hopping Potion" I made this morning! Just drink it!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 오늘 아침에 만든 용기 충전 깡충깡충 물약이야! 그냥 마셔!

segments.text: Er, what are you ... Wait a minute!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 앗, 이건... 잠깐만요!

segments.text: Mi-Miss ... you are really going ... to sell ... your potion ...
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 아, 아가씨... 정말로... 물약을... 파실 건가요...

segments.text: See? Now you've got a lot more strength, right?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 봐? 이제 훨씬 더 강해졌지?

segments.text: I added the most effective tears of the pure-blooded Koresck and the strongest bile acid of blue lobster.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 가장 효과적인 순혈 코레스크의 눈물과 가장 강력한 블루 랍스터의 담즙산을 넣었어.

segments.text: Definitely makes you forget the fears, and be courageous, and excited for two whole days without food and drink!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 확실히 두려움을 잊게 해주고, 용기를 북돋아 주고, 이틀 동안 먹지도 마시지도 않고 신나게 해줘!

segments.text: Ms. Sotheby, did you feed him a whole bottle of that? It's too dangerous!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소더비 양, 그 사람한테 한 병을 다 먹인 거예요? 너무 위험해요!

segments.text: Whoaaaaaa!!
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 우와아아아아!!

segments.text: Too bad ... he doesn't look right ... Hold the handrail!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 큰일이야... 좋지 않아 보이는데... 손잡이를 꽉 잡아요!

segments.text: Whoa, whoa, whoahhh, I've never feel so good in my whole life! Charge baby, charge, charge to high Heaven!
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 우와, 우와, 우와아아! 태어나서 이렇게 기분 좋은 적은 처음이야! 돌격이다, 돌격! 하늘 끝까지 돌격하자고!

segments.text: The wheels on the bus go round and round, round and round, round and round ...♪
segments.speaker: Freddy The Driver
segments.translation: 버스의 바퀴는 빙글빙글 돌아가네, 빙글빙글, 빙글빙글...♪

segments.text: Woaaah!!
segments.speaker: Sonetto&Sotheby
segments.translation: 우와아아!!

segments.text: No way ... too fast! The speed ... i-i-it's illegal in the city. Ahhhhhh!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안 되겠어요, 너무 빨라요! 이 정도 속도면... 도시에서는 불법인데.... 으악....!!

segments.text: Hey, Freddy! We're at the bar already! Don't ... step on it!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어이, 프레디! 우리 벌써 바에 도착했다고! 그러니까... 밟지 마!

segments.text: St-stop ... already ... help ...!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그, 그만... 이제... 도와줘...!

segments.text: Hitting the wall!!
segments.speaker: Sonetto&Sotheby
segments.translation: 벽에 부딪혔어!!

segments.text: Oh ... it hurts.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 으음... 아파.

segments.text: Ms. Sotheby, Ms. Sotheby, are you alright?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소더비 씨, 소더비 씨, 괜찮으세요?

segments.text: Um ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: Where are we? I know we crashed into the back wall of The Walden …
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 여기가 어디지? 우리가 월든 뒷벽에 충돌한 건 알겠는데...

segments.text: Yes. But it looks like ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 맞아요. 근데 여기는...

segments.text: ... like an underground labyrinth.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 마치 지하 미로 같네요.

segments.text: Whoa ...! Di-did we really crash into the back wall of the bar?! The "Auto Island" ... it's stuck in the wall?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 우와...! 정-정말로 우리가 바 뒷벽에 박힌 거야?! 오토 아일랜드가... 벽에 박혀 있어?

segments.text: Freddy! Oh ... fortunately you just passed out.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 프레디! 아... 다행히 기절만 한 거네.

segments.text: Oh ... This is too bad. This is real bad ... If Mr. Karson knows I broke the barkeeper's wall ... oh ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아... 이거 정말 큰일이야. 진짜 큰일 났어... 카슨 씨가 내가 바텐더 벽을 부쉈다는 걸 알면... 아...

segments.text: The car stuck in the wall ... We have to find another way out.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우리가 들어온 구멍은 차에 막혀버려서... 다른 출구를 찾아봐야겠네요.

segments.text: Le-let's get out of here quickly, before Mr. Karson knows it!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어, 어서 빨리 여기서 나가자, 카슨 씨가 알아채기 전에!

segments.text: Gosh! The crash just now wakened the critters in the underground ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이런, 방금 있었던 충돌이 지하에 숨어 사는 크리터를 깨워 버렸어요.

segments.text: Hm? Let me see what it looks like!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 음? 어떻게 생겼는지 한번 볼게!

segments.text: Ah! It's the Carbuncle that's parasitic on the dust! They all act in groups. Generally speaking, if you see one Carbuncle, it means ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아! 먼지에 기생하는 카벙클이네! 얘들은 모두 무리를 지어 행동해. 일반적으로 카벙클 한 마리를 보면...

segments.text: There's a large group of Carbuncles around here ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이 근처에 카벙클들이 무리지어 있어...

segments.text: We have to beat them before we leave.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 먼저 녀석들을 물리쳐야 빠져나갈 수 있겠네요.

segments.text: Ok. Let's do it! M-my alchemy will definitely come in handy!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 좋아. 해보자! 내-내 연금술이 분명히 도움이 될 거야!

segments.text: Freddy ... leave him to me. I will carry him.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 프레디 씨는... 이리 주세요. 제가 업고 갈게요.

segments.text: Ms. Sotheby, you seem to know The Walden better. Please lead the way.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소더비 씨는 월든을 잘 알고 계신 것 같으니 앞장서 주세요.

segments.text: Sure! No problem! Though it looks different from the bar I imagined, I will definitely find the right way out!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 물론이야! 문제없어! 내가 상상했던 술집과는 좀 다르게 생겼지만, 분명히 올바른 출구를 찾아낼 거야!

segments.text: Please ... help me ...
segments.translation: 제발... 도와줘...

segments.text: Schneider ... it hurts so much ...
segments.translation: 슈나이더... 나 너무 괴로워...

segments.text: Who's there?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 거기 누구죠?

segments.text: Hm? Who are you talking to?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 응? 누구한테 말하는 거야?

segments.text: I just heard ... Is it my mistake?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 방금 뭔가를 들었는데... 착각인가?

segments.text: No. It's not.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아니, 아니야.

segments.text: The liquid flowing out of the wall ... It's a mixture of human blood and vomitus.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 벽에서 흘러나오는 액체... 사람의 피와 토사물이 섞인 거예요.

segments.text: This is ... Truth Serum?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이건... 진실의 약?

segments.text: Ms. Sonetto? Why are you talking to yourself against the wall? If you want to get out soon, follow me!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 소네트 씨? 왜 벽을 보고 혼잣말을 하고 있어요? 빨리 나가고 싶으면 저를 따라오세요!

segments.text: I will be there right away.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제가 곧 그곳으로 갈게요.

segments.text: Okay. I already know where to go! Follow Sotheby. Let's go left!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 좋아. 어디로 가야 할지 이미 알고 있어! 소테비를 따라와. 왼쪽으로 가자!

segments.text: ... It shouldn't be a mistake. There is a human imprisoned by arcanum in this speakeasy. I have to report it to the Timekeeper as soon as possible.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 실수일 리 없어요. 이 주점에 마도술로 감금된 인간이 있어요. 최대한 빨리 타임키퍼에게 보고해야 해요.

segments.text: Ich bin wie eine Fahne von Fernen umgeben.
segments.translation: 나는 먼 곳들에 둘러싸인 깃발과 같다.

segments.text: Ich ahne die Winde, die kommen, und muß sie leben,
segments.translation: 다가올 바람을 예감하며, 그 속에서 살아가야 한다.

segments.text: während die Dinge unten sich noch nicht rühren：
segments.translation: 아래쪽의 상황은 아직 움직임이 없는 동안:

segments.text: die Kurse steigen noch sanft, und wir haben noch nicht Donnerstagnachmittag;
segments.translation: 주가는 아직 완만하게 상승하고 있고, 아직 목요일 오후가 되지 않았다;

segments.text: das Gold bildet eine gebrochene Linie, und es steigt immer höher.
segments.translation: 황금이 부서진 선을 이루며 점점 더 높이 올라간다.

segments.text: Und werfe mich ab und bin ganz allein
segments.translation: 그리고 나를 떨쳐내고 완전히 홀로 남는다.

segments.text: in dem großen Sturm.
segments.translation: 거대한 폭풍우 속에서.

segments.text: Thanks for coming to assist.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 도와주러 와줘서 고마워.

segments.text: To make you ask Madam Z for help, it must be tough here.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: Z 부인에게 도움을 요청하게 만들다니, 여기 상황이 꽤 심각한가 보군.

segments.text: I just don't feel good about this. Hopefully it's my misjudgment. Is everyone in position?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 좋은 예감이 들어서... 내 착각이길 바랄 뿐이야. 나머지 대원들은 이미 준비된 건가?

segments.text: Yes. Eight of the team got the invitation to the gathering. They have entered separately. Others are standing by at every entrance of the speakeasy.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 그렇습니다. 팀원 8명이 모임 초대장을 받았습니다. 각자 따로 들어갔고, 나머지는 주점의 모든 입구에서 대기 중입니다.

segments.text: These are the intels we got about The Walden. They're going to hold a live duel show tonight.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 월든에 대해 입수한 정보들이야. 오늘 밤에 라이브 결투 쇼를 개최할 예정이라고 해.

segments.text: Fighters can win stock in amount of 1 million dollars, and the betting odds can be from 5-to-1 to 10-to-1.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 파이터들은 최대 100만 달러의 상금을 획득할 수 있고, 배당률은 5대 1에서 10대 1까지 가능하다.

segments.text: ... They are crazy.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 제정신이 아니군.

segments.text: Timekeeper, please take this with you.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 이걸 가져가 주세요.

segments.text: It's the latest product from the Scientific Computing Center, "Heaven Apostle 34:7." They've added the cell sap of Bombard Ball to it. Unfold its wing and it will blast in 15 seconds.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 과학 연산 센터의 최신 제품이야, 천국의 사도 34:7이라고 해. 여기에 폭탄구의 세포액을 첨가했거든. 날개를 펼치면 15초 후에 폭발한다.

segments.text: The blast is undirectional. Please watch your position when you use it.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 폭발은 무차별적입니다. 사용할 때 위치를 조심하세요.

segments.text: Got it. Let's head down to The Walden now. You follow APPLe. Remember, to stay low profile.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알겠어. 이제 월든으로 가자, 자네는 APPLe을 뒤따르도록, 절대 이목을 끌어선 안 돼.

segments.text: Welcome, welcome everyone ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어서 와, 어서 와 모두들...

segments.text: All the new immigrants, arcanists, moralities and immoralities, Anti-Saloon League and democratic progressives, free thinkers and church-goers ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 새로 온 이민자들, 마도사들, 도덕주의자들과 비도덕주의자들, 금주 연맹과 민주적 진보주의자들, 자유사상가들과 교회 신도들...

segments.text: Welcome to your eternal home, The Walden.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 영원한 집, 월든에 오신 것을 환영합니다.

segments.text: How was it? You seem to be enjoying the last show, the Hooch Dance girl with the Boa constrictor.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어땠어? 보아뱀과 함께 춤추는 훗치 댄스 소녀의 마지막 공연을 꽤 즐기고 있는 것 같은데.

segments.text: Well, in that case, next round's Python Sweet is all on me. I assure you every Chicagoan loves the YY Bourbon. You won't forget its charm.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그렇다면 다음 라운드 파이썬 스위트는 내가 낼게. 시카고 사람이라면 누구나 YY 버번을 좋아한다고 장담해. 그 매력을 잊지 못할 거야.

segments.text: Oh, oh, I guess your eyes are fixed on the charts. Don't worry, my friends. Let's focus on the next duel instead.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아, 아, 차트에 시선이 고정되어 있는 것 같네요. 걱정하지 마세요, 친구들. 다음 대결에 집중해 봅시다.

segments.text: Trust me, and you'll get the return beyond your craziest imagination.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 날 믿어, 그럼 네가 상상도 못 할 만큼의 보답을 받게 될 거야.

segments.text: Oh, so crowded! This APPLe's favorite bow tie almost gets lost!
segments.speaker: APPLe
