segments.translation: 윽, 너무 비좁군요! 저 APPLe이 아끼는 나비넥타이가 망가질 뻔했다고요!

segments.text: Why is this speakeasy so busy? It doesn't look like an illegal place at all.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 이 지하 주점은 왜 이렇게 손님이 많은 거죠? 불법으로 운영되는 곳 같지는 않은데.

segments.text: This is the only speakeasy in the states that has never been given a shakedown. It's said that Forget Me Not, owner of the speakeasy, can make a potion drink which is not alcoholic until people drink it.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 여기는 미국에서 단 한 번도 단속을 받은 적이 없는 유일한 밀주점이야. 이 밀주점의 주인인 포겟 미 낫이 마시기 전까지는 알코올이 아니었다가 마시는 순간 술이 되는 물약 음료를 만들 수 있다고 하더군.

segments.text: From purchasing raw materials, getting a medical store license, distilling, transporting and selling, and ensuring the security together with gangs, we got nothing on them.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 원료 구매부터 의료용품 판매 허가, 증류, 운송, 판매, 그리고 갱단과 함께하는 보안까지... 우리가 잡을 수 있는 건 아무것도 없어.

segments.text: It welcomes all the marginals, and doles out patronage positions. Through this, The Walden has already cemented itself as the one above all other speakeasies in Chicago.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 이곳은 모든 소외된 자들을 받아들이고, 후원자 자리를 나누어준다. 이를 통해 월든은 이미 시카고의 모든 밀주점들 중 최고의 자리를 확고히 굳혔다.

segments.text: Did you find out the relationship between Manus Vindictae and him?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 손과 그 사람 사이의 관계를 알아냈어?

segments.text: No. His document was edited purposely, but we can be sure that he is from this era.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 아니다. 그의 문서는 의도적으로 편집된 것이지만, 그가 이 시대 출신이라는 건 확실하다.

segments.text: However, we found that the time he made contact with the politicians was close to the beginning of the unusual boom of the domestic financial market.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 하지만 그가 정치인들과 접촉한 시기가 국내 금융시장의 이상한 호황이 시작된 시점과 거의 일치한다는 것을 발견했습니다.

segments.text: Since then, you can't talk about arcane stock trading without mentioning The Walden.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 그때부터 마도술 주식 거래를 논할 때 월든을 빼놓고는 얘기할 수 없게 됐지.

segments.text: Alright, my friends!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 좋아, 친구들!

segments.text: Shh.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 쉿.

segments.text: We are about to have a taste of tonight's appetizer.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이제 오늘 밤의 전채 요리를 맛볼 시간이군.

segments.text: Let's welcome our fighter of the year! The defender of the undefeated honor of knocking out ten consecutive arcanists and human challengers!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 올해의 파이터를 환영합시다! 마도술사와 인간 도전자들을 연속으로 10명이나 쓰러뜨리며 무패 기록의 명예를 지켜낸 수호자를!

segments.text: It's her?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그 애야?!

segments.text: Then, which guest will have the honor to be the challenger of the duel?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그럼, 어느 손님이 결투의 도전자가 되는 영광을 차지하실까요?

segments.text: A million dollar coupon! You get beat the crap out, and lie on bed for two months. Worth it!
segments.speaker: Guest I
segments.translation: 백만 달러짜리 쿠폰이야! 개박살 나서 두 달 동안 침대에 누워 있어야 하지만. 그래도 본전은 뽑겠어!

segments.text: Haha, I prefer betting. Maybe I can get a Hamptons' villa!
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 하하, 난 베팅이 더 좋아. 어쩌면 햄프턴스 별장을 딸 수도 있잖아!

segments.text: The fate of this challenger, we let the spotlight decide.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이 도전자의 운명은, 스포트라이트가 결정하도록 두자.

segments.text: The spotlight chose you, lady with a top hat.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 스포트라이트가 당신을 선택했군요, 실크햇을 쓴 숙녀님.

segments.text: S
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: S

segments.text: What a lucky guy!
segments.speaker: All Guests
segments.translation: 운 좋은 녀석이네!

segments.text: Come on! Get on the stage!
segments.speaker: All Guests
segments.translation: 자, 어서! 무대 위로 올라와!

segments.text: I give you, Schneider, the defending champion of last year, and the Timekeeper from St. Pavlov Foundation, Ms. Vertin.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 소개해드리겠습니다. 작년 우승자 슈나이더, 그리고 성 파블로프 재단의 타임키퍼 버틴 씨입니다.

segments.text: ... I'm going. Don't worry.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...일단 올라갈게. 걱정하지 마.

segments.text: And now, let the duel begin.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 자, 이제 결투를 시작하자.

segments.text: Heh heh, long time no see, Ms. Governor.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤, 오랜만이네요, 총독님.

segments.text: It seems my lord would like to see me kill you myself. He has even created such a chance on purpose.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 제가 모시는 분께서 직접 당신을 처치하는 모습을 보고 싶어하시는 것 같군요. 일부러 이런 기회까지 만들어주셨으니 말입니다.

segments.text: Pap.
segments.translation: 팝.

segments.text: Oops, I missed it.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아, 놓쳤네.

segments.text: Come on. Why do you have to waste your life? Are you here to enforce justice of the Foundation?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 이봐. 왜 굳이 목숨을 버리려고 하는 거야? 재단의 정의를 실현하러 온 건가?

segments.text: The Foundation obviously has no justice. You don't even dare make the "Storm" public.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 재단에게는 정의 따위 없다는 게 뻔하잖아. 폭풍우를 공개할 용기도 없으면서.

segments.text: Turn down my "families" with ridiculous lies. Is that your so-called justice?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 말도 안 되는 거짓말로 내 가족들을 거절하다니. 그게 네가 말하는 정의야?

segments.text: Pap, pap, pap.
segments.translation: 팝, 팝, 팝.

segments.text: The fragrance of orange blossom on her suddenly opens out in the air.
segments.translation: 그녀에게서 나는 오렌지 꽃의 향기가 갑자기 공기 중에 퍼져 나간다.

segments.text: You've been there? The scent of orange on Sonetto's mission capsule ... That's why you can hijack the hostages outside the parking?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너 거기 가본 적 있어? 소네트의 임무 캡슐에서 나는 오렌지 향... 그래서 주차장 밖의 인질들을 납치할 수 있었던 거야?

segments.text: Heh heh ... There is no shelter there for me. Then all I can do is to complete the tasks for my lord.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤... 그곳엔 내가 숨을 곳이 없군. 그렇다면 주인님을 위한 임무를 완수하는 것뿐이야.

segments.text: Oops, I just lost my focus. I will become serious now!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 앗, 집중력이 흐트러졌네. 이제 진짜로 해보자!

segments.text: Whoooah! I'm gonna raise! Just on that Ver-Ver-Ver-whatever!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 우와아아! 나 레이즈할 거야! 저 버-버-버-뭐시기한테!

segments.text: Come on! The champion! I bet all my money on you!
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 어서! 챔피언! 내 전 재산을 당신한테 걸었다고!

segments.text: Ah, the Dow rockets to 381.17?! Then I-I add 5,000 more!
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 아, 다우가 381.17까지 치솟았다고?! 그럼 나-나는 5,000을 더 추가한다!

segments.text: Aha. Nice! Nice! Ms. Governor, you're much better than I thought.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아하. 좋아! 좋아! 총독님, 생각했던 것보다 훨씬 뛰어나시네요.

segments.text: Not like the little punks in the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 재단의 그 꼬마들과는 다르지.

segments.text: Why did you go to the Foundation? Can't the Manus give you what you want?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜 재단에 투항하려고 하는 거지? 재건은 네 요구조건을 들어주지 않는 건가?

segments.text: Heh heh, of course it's because we, the ones sifted out by the "Storm," want ... to live.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤, 당연하지. 폭풍우에 의해 걸러진 우리들이... 살고 싶어 하니까 말이야.

segments.text: The "Storm" is about to fall. Who cares whether the shelter is the eave ... or the rubble?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 곧 몰아칠 텐데. 피난처가 처마든... 아니면 잔해든 무슨 상관이야?

segments.text: Before finishing her words, Schneider attempts to chop Vertin on the neck with her hand.
segments.translation: 말을 마치기도 전에 슈나이더가 손날로 버틴의 목을 치려고 시도한다.

segments.text: What if I say, I can provide you with the shelter?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 너에게 피난처를 제공해줄 수 있다고 하면 어때?

segments.text: Her hand halts in the air for a second. Yet eventually, she decides to point the pistol toward Vertin.
segments.translation: 그녀의 손이 공중에서 잠시 멈춘다. 하지만 결국 그녀는 권총을 버틴에게 겨누기로 결심한다.

segments.text: The person who said this to me last time is just sitting behind us watching the game.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 지난번에 나한테 그런 말을 했던 사람이 바로 우리 뒤에 앉아서 경기를 보고 있어.

segments.text: Pap! Pap!
segments.translation: 팝! 팝!

segments.text: Huh? The trend is falling by 31 points. Is it me or ...?
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 어? 추세가 31포인트나 떨어졌네. 내 탓인가 아니면...?

segments.text: There is no way ahead. It seems to be another dead end.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 앞에 길이 없군요. 또 막다른 길인가 봐요.

segments.text: Huh? Hmm ... behind this wall, I hear many cheers! This is the exit. It leads to the outside!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어? 음... 이 벽 너머에서 많은 환호성이 들려! 여기가 출구야. 밖으로 통하는 길이야!

segments.text: There are indeed many voices. Hmm? Timekeeper? I seem to hear her voice!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 많은 사람의 목소리가 들리긴 하네요... 음? 타임키퍼? 그녀의 목소리를 들은 것 같은데요?

segments.text: Hey! Anyone here? Help us please! We're trapped behind the wall!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 여기 누구 없어요? 도와주세요! 저희가 벽 뒤에 갇혔어요!

segments.text: No. They can not hear us. Let me blast the wall!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안 되겠어요. 저쪽에선 안 들리나 봐요. 제가 벽을 폭파할게요!

segments.text: No way! It sounds like a banquet outside. A cheerful one! It would be bad if the rubble hit them.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 안 돼! 밖에서 연회 소리가 들려. 정말 즐거운 분위기야! 잔해가 그들을 덮치면 큰일이야.

segments.text: Let me look through the cracks ... Hmm ... It seems we are behind the spotlight.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 틈새로 살펴볼게... 음... 우리가 스포트라이트 뒤편에 있는 것 같아.

segments.text: The cracks are huge! Why don't I use a corrosive potion to dissolve them, so we could move the bricks!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 균열이 엄청 크네! 부식성 물약으로 녹여서 벽돌을 옮길 수 있게 하는 건 어때!

segments.text: Good idea! Let's start from the middle!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좋은 생각이네요! 우선 가운데부터 시작하죠!

segments.text: We should get out of here as soon as possible. Timekeeper, she definitely needs my help ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어서 여기서 나가야 해요. 타임키퍼, 분명 제 도움이 필요할 거예요...

segments.text: Huh!
segments.speaker: Schneider

segments.text: Ah ha! The joy, the joy from the bottom of my heart ... ♪
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아하! 기쁨이야, 마음 깊은 곳에서 우러나는 기쁨... ♪

segments.text: Another 19 points down? What the hell? What are they doing?
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 또 19포인트나 떨어졌다고? 도대체 뭐하는 거야? 저 사람들이 뭘 하고 있는 건데?

segments.text: Can I ... get my 5,000 back? No?
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 그... 5,000원 돌려받을 수 있을까요? 안 되나요?

segments.text: Hey, Forget Me Not! Is there something wrong with your chart? Today is not April Fools'!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 야, 물망초! 네 차트에 뭔가 문제 있는 거 아니야? 오늘은 만우절이 아니라고!

segments.text: Ah ha? What's the matter?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아하? 무슨 일이야?

segments.text: Seems no one cares about us anymore, Ms. Governor ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 이제 아무도 우리에게 관심이 없는 것 같네요, 총독님...

segments.text: If that is the case ... I will make your arms bleed, my lord. Will the audience be interested then?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그렇다면... 당신의 팔에서 피를 흘리게 해드리겠습니다. 그러면 관객들이 흥미를 가질까요?

segments.text: Ugh!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 윽!

segments.text: The market is really dropping ahead of time. To accelerate the history like this ... is that for ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 시장이 예정보다 빨리 폭락하고 있어. 이렇게 역사를 가속화하는 건... 혹시...

segments.text: Huh! Can't you feel the pain? That's really annoying. Next time if I aim at your thigh, will they be more attracted?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 흥! 아픔을 못 느끼는 거야? 정말 짜증나네. 다음엔 허벅지를 노려보면 더 관심을 끌까?

segments.text: Pap!!
Damn it! Is it going to f**
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 젠장! 이게 뭐 하는 짓이야!

segments.text: My house! No, my everything! Get my money back! Give it back, you son of a b
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 내 집이! 아니, 내 모든 것이! 내 돈 돌려줘! 돌려달라고, 이 개자식아!

segments.text: Hello? Darling, no-no I can explain. It's just for the moment. Do you think the Wall Street bankers will just sit around and watch?
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 여보세요? 자기야, 아니야 설명할 수 있어. 잠깐일 뿐이야. 월스트리트 은행가들이 그냥 가만히 앉아서 구경만 할 거라고 생각해?

segments.text: What? Everyone is exiting! The trading volume is more than 12 million shares?!
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 뭐? 다들 빠져나가고 있어! 거래량이 1,200만 주를 넘었다고?!

segments.text: Pay you my ass! Who has the cash? You tell me, who has the cash!
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 돈을 내라고? 개소리! 누가 돈이 있다고? 말해봐, 누가 돈이 있냐고!

segments.text: Let me out! I'm in a hurry. I-I need to go home! I need to go home!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 날 내보내 줘! 급해! 나-나 집에 가야 해! 집에 가야 한다고!

segments.text: Pap!
segments.translation: 탕!

segments.text: Heh heh! Hilarious! I'm killing people but nobody gives a damn!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤! 웃기네! 사람들을 죽이고 있는데 아무도 신경 안 쓴다고!

segments.text: Pap pap! Pap pap!
segments.translation: 팝팝! 팝팝!

segments.text: It's too dangerous! Why doesn’t Vertin use that blasting Bombard Ball!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 너무 위험해요...! 버틴 씨는 왜 아직도 폭발 볼을 쓰지 않는거지?

segments.text: No, not yet! We're fighting up close here, can't let the bomb give us away!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 아니, 아직 안 돼! 우리가 근접전을 벌이고 있는데, 폭탄 때문에 들킬 수는 없어!

segments.text: Fine. Enough fun for me.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 좋아. 이제 충분히 즐겼군.

segments.text: If I don't kill you, I'm afraid we won't be able to leave tonight.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 널 죽이지 않으면 오늘 밤 여기서 나갈 수 없을 것 같은데.

segments.text: It would be great if I met you and your "rubble" first, and so we would have not ... Forget it.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 당신과 당신의 잔해를 먼저 만났다면 좋았을 텐데, 그랬다면 우리가... 아니, 됐어.

segments.text: Ms. Governor, goodbye.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 총독님, 안녕히 가세요.

segments.text: She slowly raises the pistol. Her face is as pale and delicate as a sad white pigeon.
segments.translation: 그녀는 천천히 권총을 들어 올린다. 그녀의 얼굴은 슬픈 흰 비둘기처럼 창백하고 연약하다.

segments.text: *lights on*
segments.translation: *불이 켜진다*

segments.text: Dazzling spotlights suddenly focus on Vertin and Schneider and blind them.
segments.translation: 눈부신 조명이 갑자기 버틴과 슈나이더에게 집중되어 그들의 시야를 가린다.

segments.text: Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼!

segments.text: Pap pap pap!
segments.translation: 팝팝팝!

segments.text: Hurried footsteps are coming toward Vertin.
segments.translation: 급한 발걸음 소리가 버틴을 향해 다가오고 있다.

segments.text: Timekeeper, what's going on? You are bleeding!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 대체 무슨 일이죠, 피가 많이 나요...!

segments.text: I'm fine. Why are you ... behind the stage? You seem well. Thank goodness.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 괜찮아. 어떻게 무대 뒤에서... 달려온 거야? 다친 덴 없어 보이네... 다행이야.

segments.text: Come here, quick! A lot of people are arguing there. Oh! Careful, you'll be knocked down!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이리 와, 빨리! 저기서 사람들이 많이 싸우고 있어. 아! 조심해, 넘어질 뻔했잖아!

segments.text: A slow clapping sound comes from the stage away from the fighting ring.
segments.translation: 격투장에서 떨어진 무대 쪽에서 느린 박수 소리가 들려온다.

segments.text: Those behind him ... are men of the Manus Vindictae!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그 뒤에 있는 자들은... 재건의 손 소속이야!

segments.text: Thank you all, for giving this about-to-end world such an unforgettable curtain call.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 모두들 고마워. 곧 끝날 이 세상에 이토록 잊을 수 없는 마지막 무대를 선사해줘서.

segments.text: Forget Me Not?! I lost all the stocks I bought from you! How will you make up for it!
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫?! 너한테서 산 주식이 전부 날아갔어! 어떻게 책임질 거야!

segments.text: A very good question, dear Mr. Thomas.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아주 좋은 질문이군요, 토마스 씨.

segments.text: I am here to share good news with you, comparing with which, the Dow dropping more than 300 is not worth mentioning.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 좋은 소식을 전하러 왔어요. 이 소식에 비하면 다우지수가 300포인트 넘게 떨어진 것도 언급할 가치조차 없죠.

segments.text: The world you live in, year 1929 of the Roaring 20s, is welcoming its finale.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신이 살고 있는 세계, 광란의 20년대 1929년이 그 막을 내리려 하고 있어.

segments.text: And now, I invite you to wait quietly for the finale to come.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 자, 이제 조용히 기다려. 피날레가 올 때까지 말이야.

segments.text: Are you crazy? Do you know what you’re talk ...
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 정신이 나갔나? 지금 무슨 소리를 하는 건...

segments.text: *casting incantation*
segments.translation: *주문을 외우는 중*

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Thomas
segments.translation: 으으윽...

segments.text: Don't worry. He will be quiet for a while.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마. 한동안은 조용할 거야.

segments.text: The crowd is no longer noisy.
segments.translation: 군중은 더 이상 시끄럽지 않다.

segments.text: Although the party balloons, the feather decorations, and well-dressed guests still make this place seem a cheerful banquet, the whole room is filled with absolute silence.
segments.translation: 파티 풍선과 깃털 장식, 그리고 정장을 차려입은 손님들이 여전히 이곳을 즐거운 연회장처럼 보이게 만들고 있지만, 방 전체는 완전한 정적에 휩싸여 있었다.

segments.text: Silence named "Fear."
segments.translation: 공포라는 이름의 침묵.

segments.text: *phone ringing*
segments.translation: *전화벨 소리*

segments.text: Hello? Oh, the Dow closed at ... 230.07. I see.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 여보세요? 아, 다우지수가... 230.07에서 마감됐군요. 알겠습니다.

segments.text: That's it, my friends. Wall Street has collapsed.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 끝났어, 친구들. 월스트리트가 무너졌다.

segments.text: And the "Storm" ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 그리고 그 폭풍우는...

segments.text: ... has finally come.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: ... 드디어 왔군.

segments.text: At first, it's a drop of rain you can barely see.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 처음엔 거의 보이지도 않는 빗방울 하나일 뿐이야.

segments.text: From the drain, from the bottom of rubber shoes, from the milk about to be dumped, they become an unknown pond.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 배수구에서, 고무신 밑바닥에서, 버려질 뻔한 우유에서, 그것들은 정체불명의 연못이 되지.

segments.text: Then, the pond becomes the raindrop. It leaves the ground without hesitation, as if trying to get rid of a pernicious habit ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그러면 연못이 빗방울이 되는 거야. 마치 나쁜 습관을 떨쳐내려는 것처럼, 주저 없이 땅을 떠나지...

segments.text: ... a pernicious habit of this era and society.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: ... 이 시대와 사회의 해로운 습관이지.

segments.text:
What I said caused uproar in the crowd. 
And that habit will only grow, like a "mutation," haunting every living body.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation:
포겟 미 낫: 내 말이 군중들 사이에 소동을 일으켰어. 
그리고 그 습성은 돌연변이처럼 계속 자라나서, 모든 생명체를 괴롭힐 거야.

segments.text: In the 60s, it crashed people into absurd cartoons. In the 90s, it turns our veins into cables.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 60년대에는 사람들을 황당한 만화로 만들어버렸고, 90년대에는 우리 혈관을 케이블로 바꿔놓는군.

segments.text: At last, all the absurdities will transform into a "Storm," and eventually "cleanse" the world.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 마침내, 모든 부조리함이 폭풍우로 변모하여, 결국 세상을 정화하게 될 거야.

segments.text: Only the people who weren't sifted out have the right to ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 걸러지지 않은 사람들만이 ... 할 자격이 있어.

segments.text: "Reverse," with us.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 리버스", 우리와 함께.

segments.text: These are the details that couldn’t be revealed to the public. Our official—Ms. Vertin, you must be familiar with it, right?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이건 대중에게 공개될 수 없었던 세부사항들이야. 우리 공식... 버틴 씨, 이미 잘 알고 있겠지?

segments.text: You know this better than anyone else ... the countdown to the sifting, has already begun.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신이 누구보다 잘 알고 있잖아... 선별을 위한 카운트다운은 이미 시작됐어.

segments.text: Correct. I finally got the answer.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그랬군. 드디어 답을 알아냈어.

segments.text: That's all for what we know about the "Storm."
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 여기까지가 폭풍우에 관해 우리가 알고 있는 정보들입니다.

segments.text: And what our Institutum does is to catch in advance any time, event, or place that may cause the "Storm."
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 그리고 폭풍우를 일으킬 수 있는 모든 시간, 사건, 장소를 미리 포착하는 게 우리 연구소가 하는 일입니다.

segments.text: For ourselves we call it—Chaotic Energy.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 우리들은 그걸 혼돈 에너지라고 부르죠.

segments.text: According to the latest research materials, we infer that the "Storm" that could reverse the world was caused by the "Original Butterfly," flapping its wings in the ancient time.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 최신 연구 자료에 따르면, 세상을 뒤바꿀 수 있는 폭풍우는 고대에 원시 나비가 날개를 펄럭인 것이 원인이라고 추정됩니다.

segments.text: The ancient time you said ... is that the oldest of the oldest? Well, the time with no record?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 먼 옛날이라는 게... 아주 아주 먼 옛날... 음... 그러니까 공백의 시대란 거야?

segments.text: I'm afraid it is.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 안타깝게도 그렇습니다.

segments.text: The "Butterfly" created the prototype for the prehistoric Chaotic Energy, which became active and unstable through years of accumulation and evolution.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 버터플라이가 선사시대 혼돈 에너지의 원형을 만들어냈고, 수년간의 축적과 진화를 통해 활성화되면서 불안정해진 거죠.

segments.text: Someone took advantage of its instability, and created the "Storm" that could reverse the world.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 누군가가 이 불안정함을 이용해 세상이 거꾸로 가게 하는 폭풍우를 만들었고요.

segments.text: So the circles on your map, are they the markings of where the "Storm" may occur this time?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 그럼 이 자료에 나와 있는 동그라미들은 이번에 폭풍우가 발생할 수 있는 지점을 표시한 거야?

segments.text: And the mark closest to us ... is now flashing with a red warning light.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이곳에서 제일 가까운 이 표시에는... 적색 경고등이 켜져 있네.

segments.text: Yes. Because it's in the eye of the "Storm."
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 맞아요. 이번 폭풍우의 중심이니까요.

segments.text: In The Walden in Chicago ... where your friends are now.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 시카고에 있는 월든이에요... 당신의 친구들이 있는 곳이죠.

segments.text: Let us wish her the best of luck.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 그녀에게 행운을 빌어줍시다.

segments.text: I finally got the answer.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드디어 답을 알아냈어.

segments.text: You are using history to expedite the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너희들은 역사를 이용해서 폭풍우의 진행을 앞당긴 거야.

segments.text: Community conflicts, turbulent history, new technology ... all of these may lead to the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사회적 갈등, 역사적 혼란, 새로운 과학 기술의 탄생... 이 모든 게 폭풍우를 부를 수 있지.

segments.text: Since the last day of 1999, the world has started to get reversed by the "Storm," one after another.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1999년 마지막 날부터 이 세계는 계속되는 폭풍우 때문에 거꾸로 흐르고 있어.

segments.text: Which past do you want to return? Fifty years ago? A century ago? Or ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너희들은 언제로 돌아가고 싶은 거지? 50년 전? 100년 전? 아니면...

segments.text: The "past" with the right order, of course.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 물론, 올바른 순서의 과거를 말이야.

segments.text: Well, I didn’t expect the human lackey to understand what the right order is.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 뭐, 인간 앞잡이가 올바른 순서가 뭔지 이해할 거라고는 기대 안 했지만 말이야.

segments.text: Friends of The Walden all along, there is not much time for us.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 월든의 친구들이라... 우리에게 남은 시간이 많지 않아.

segments.text: Ask yourselves, who will enlighten you of the impending doom but we Manus Vindictae?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 스스로에게 물어보라. 다가오는 파멸에 대해 너희를 깨우쳐 줄 자가 우리 재건의 손 말고 또 누가 있겠느냐?

segments.text: The last 24 hours in your life, how are you going to spend them?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 인생의 마지막 24시간, 어떻게 보낼 거야?

segments.text: To cry for your no-longer-valuable property? Lie to yourself that all this is not true?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 더 이상 가치 없는 재산을 위해 울겠다는 거야? 이 모든 게 사실이 아니라고 자신을 속이겠다고?

segments.text: Or to take our mission to rebuild the world, extend your lives, until you see the birth of a new order?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아니면 세계를 재건하려는 우리의 사명을 받아들여, 새로운 질서가 탄생하는 것을 볼 때까지 너희의 생명을 연장시켜 주는 것은 어떨까?

segments.text: Put on the mask ... and I won't get sifted out by the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: Vip Guest
segments.translation: 가면을 쓰면... 폭풍우에 걸러지지 않는다는 거야?

segments.text: We will assure the safety of every one of us.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리 모두의 안전을 보장하겠어.

segments.text: Please do not lie! You actually detained a human in your secret room!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 거짓말하지 마세요! 비밀 방에 인간을 가둬놓고 있잖아요!

segments.text: So, your first mission to join us Manus is ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그래서, 우리 재건의 손에 합류하기 위한 너의 첫 번째 임무는...

segments.text: These government lackeys, who hide the truth of the "Storm" from you—take them down.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우의 진실을 너에게 숨기고 있는 그 정부의 앞잡이들을—쓸어버려.

segments.text: Are you really joining this insurgent organization? He is using your fears!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 정말 이 반역자 무리와 한 패가 되려는 건가요? 당신들의 두려움을 이용하고 있는 것뿐이라고요!

segments.text: Ms. Sonetto, we are scared, but we are free. You know what I am talking about.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 우리는 무섭지만 자유로워요. 제가 무슨 말을 하는지 아시죠.

segments.text: The rioters are here! Be careful! There are so many of them!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 폭도들이 왔어요! 조심하세요! 정말 많아요!

segments.text: Where are my bodyguards!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 내 경호원들은 어디 있어!

segments.text: Ms. Sotheby, we are here! We'll have you surrounded, please stay inside!
segments.speaker: Bodyguards
segments.translation: 소테비 씨, 저희가 왔습니다! 주변을 경비하겠으니 안에 계세요!

segments.text: ... Of course Mr. Karson lied to me.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: ... 물론 카슨 씨가 저에게 거짓말을 했죠.

segments.text: Fine. It's time to show the power of our manor. Ms. Sonetto, we are here to help!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 좋아. 이제 우리 저택의 힘을 보여줄 시간이야. 소네트 씨, 우리가 도우러 왔어!

segments.text: Everyone else come with me! Let's break out!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 다른 사람들은 나와 함께 와! 탈출하자!

segments.text: We've been waiting for this moment ...
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Members
segments.translation: 우리는 이 순간을 기다려왔습니다...

segments.text: Let's go!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Members
segments.translation: 가자!

segments.text: A vortex, inside the bar, is whirling.
segments.translation: 주점 안은 소용돌이를 이루었다.

segments.text: A vortex full of compressed lips, dull eyes, and irrational words.
segments.translation: 굳게 다문 입, 초점을 잃은 눈빛, 허망한 단어로 가득 찬 소용돌이였다.

segments.text: I-I-I'm going home.
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 나-나-나는 집에 갈 거야.

segments.text: The speakeasy is shaking.
segments.translation: 술집이 흔들리고 있다.

segments.text: Let me outta here. I don't want any gathering! Screw the money! I'm leaving here ... lu-lunatics!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 여기서 나가게 해줘. 모임 같은 거 싫어! 돈 따위 집어쳐! 난 여기서 나갈 거야... 미, 미치광이들!

segments.text: The walls are twisting.
segments.translation: 벽들이 비틀리고 있다.

segments.text: The door ... where's the door? The window? Haha ... did I go crazy too?
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 문이... 문이 어디 있지? 창문은? 하하... 나도 미쳐버린 건가?

segments.text: It's too dangerous outside.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 밖은 너무 위험해.

segments.text: Without our masks, you'll soon get infected with the "pernicious habit" of the era, and be sifted out by the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 가면이 없으면, 너도 곧 그 시대의 악습에 감염되어 폭풍우에 의해 걸러져 나갈 거야.

segments.text: I don't care! I don't give a f**k!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 상관없어! 엿이나 먹으라고!

segments.text: I can never repay the debt in my lifetime! Aha, let me go before I go insane ...
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 평생 가도 이 은혜를 갚을 수 없을 것 같아! 아하, 미쳐버리기 전에 어서 가게 해줘...

segments.text: You are the government. I-I didn’t do anything wrong! I'm begging you, help us!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 당신들은 정부 사람들이잖아요. 저-저는 잘못한 게 없어요! 제발, 우리를 도와주세요!

segments.text: Don't be afraid. We will definitely ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마세요. 저희가 반드시...

segments.text: Timekeeper ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼...

segments.text: They've re-constructed the building. All the exits are blocked.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 건물은 녀석들이 개조한 거야. 모든 출구를 막아버렸지.

segments.text: We got two civilians hurt already!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 이미 민간인 두 명이 다쳤다고!

segments.text: There are so many masked civilians among our enemies ... The next battle will be harder!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 적들 사이에 가면을 쓴 민간인들이 너무 많아... 다음 전투는 더 힘들 거야!

segments.text: We can't keep fighting like this. We need to find a way out ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 계속 이런 혼전을 이어갈 순 없어, 반드시 돌파구를 찾아야 해.

segments.text: Way out? Oh! Sotheby has got an idea!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 탈출구? 아! 소더비한테 좋은 아이디어가 있어!

segments.text: Everyone, follow me! The exit is just behind the spotlight on the stage. Hurry up! Don't be left behind!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 모두, 나를 따라와! 출구는 무대 조명 바로 뒤에 있어. 서둘러! 뒤처지지 마!

segments.text: We'll protect everyone on both sides! Hey! Stay close if you wanna live!
segments.speaker: Bodyguards
segments.translation: 양쪽 모두 지켜드리겠습니다! 이봐요! 살고 싶으면 가까이 붙어 있어!

segments.text: Me! Me! Me! Me!
segments.speaker: Guest
segments.translation: 나야! 나야! 나야! 나야!

segments.text: The hidden path they just made? ... That may work.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아까 찾아낸 비밀 통로인가... 어쩌면 가능할지도 몰라.

segments.text: Leave four behind for the team! Everyone else move! Don't get caught!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 기동 부대원 4명은 뒤를 엄호하도록! 서두르자! 따라잡혀선 안 돼!

segments.text: Copy that!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Members
segments.translation: 알겠습니다!

segments.text: Ha ha ha ha!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 하하하하!

segments.text: Why would they go underground? There isn't even a window.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 왜 지하로 가려는 거야? 창문도 없는데.

segments.text: It gets easier. Think of the time. She'll be back soon.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 점점 나아질 거야. 시간을 생각해봐. 곧 돌아올 테니까.

segments.text: Hah?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 하?

segments.text: Why is it ... quite different ... from before?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 왜 이렇게... 예전과... 많이 다르지?

segments.text: Was the wall in this color just now? I think ... there was a turn at the end ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 방금 전에 벽이 이런 색이었나? 내 생각에는... 끝에 모퉁이가 있었던 것 같은데...

segments.text: Is it ... is it because of the great arcanum?!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 혹시... 혹시 거대한 마도술 때문인가요?!

segments.text: They've made an underground labyrinth in the speakeasy! The end of the labyrinth, what will that be?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그들이 주점 지하에 미로를 만들어놨어! 미로의 끝에는 뭐가 있을까?

segments.text: Timekeeper, Sotheby and I have explored here for a while.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 소더비 씨와 제가 이곳을 둘러봤었어요.

segments.text: The overall area of this secret chamber is not too big, but many obstacles here can move. It's easy to get lost.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 밀실이 크지는 않지만, 움직이는 장애물이 많아서 길을 잃기 쉬워요.

segments.text: I had drawn a map before, and the exit is very close in this direction. As long as it's near the outer wall of the speakeasy, we will be able to break through!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전에 지도를 그려뒀는데, 이쪽 방향으로 가면 출구가 아주 가까워요. 주점의 외벽 근처만 가면 돌파할 수 있을 거예요!

segments.text: Right! Right! Ms. Sonetto is exceptional!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 맞아! 맞아! 소네트 씨는 정말 대단해!

segments.text: Ok. Then ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아. 그럼...

segments.text: Yes. Follow the light.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그래. 빛을 따라와.

segments.text: Do not make any noise ... I will meet you soon.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 소리 내지 마... 곧 만나러 갈게.

segments.text: ... I'll go get Marian. I think I can find her. She must still be here!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: ... 내가 마리안을 데려올게. 찾을 수 있을 것 같아. 분명 아직 여기 있을 거야!

segments.text: ... Is Schneider casting an arcane skill ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 슈나이더가 마도술을 사용한 건가...?

segments.text: She is near us ... but why can I sense that ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그녀가 우리 근처에 있어... 하지만 내가 왜 그걸 느낄 수 있는 거지...

segments.text: Timekeeper? Do you ... have any questions about the plan?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼? 계획에 대해... 궁금한 게 있으신가요?

segments.text: No, it's nothing. You make the call.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아니야, 신경 쓰지 마. 네 계획대로 하자.

segments.text: There will be many unexpected dangers in the labyrinth. We need to move carefully.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미궁에는 아직 예상하지 못한 위험 요소들이 많이 남아있을 거야. 긴장을 늦춰선 안 돼.

segments.text: Not so many forks ahead! We are getting closer to the outer wall.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 갈림길이 줄어들고 있어요! 외벽이 점점 가까워지고 있나 봐요!

segments.text: Yes. I heard the sounds of the street.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 응. 길거리 소리를 들었어.

segments.text: Miss Sotheby, did you get hurt? We didn't know there were so many ambushes ...
segments.speaker: Bodyguards
segments.translation: 소테비 양, 다치지 않으셨나요? 이렇게 많은 매복이 있을 줄 몰랐습니다...

segments.text: No worries! You carry Freddy ... ahem ... and clean up the potion on his mouth!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 괜찮아! 당신이 프레디를... 음... 안고 가서 입가에 묻은 물약을 닦아줘!

segments.text: We gathered much intelligence this time. When we get out of here, I will write a report ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이번에 정보를 많이 수집했어요. 여기서 나가면 보고서를 작성하겠습니다...

segments.text: Oh, and ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아, 그리고...

segments.text: Timekeeper, there is another person!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 한 명 더 있어요!

segments.text: I heard someone asking for help around here! There was also remnants of potion there ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 근처에서 누가 살려달라고 하는 소리를 들었어요! 거기엔 포션도 많이 남아있었는데...

segments.text: I want to help her get out.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 사람을 구해서 나가게 도와주고 싶어요.

segments.text: Can you find her position?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어디 있는지 찾을 수 있겠어?

segments.text: Let me think ... it should be around the wall, in front of the critter lair ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음... 생각해보니... 벽 근처, 그 괴물 소굴 앞쪽 어디엔가 있을 거예요...

segments.text: At the end of this corner ... turn right ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 모퉁이를 지나서... 다시 오른쪽으로...

segments.text: Huh! Sis, it's Schneider, call my name …
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 어! 언니, 나 슈나이더야, 내 이름 불러줘...

segments.text: Don't you remember me? It's Schneider ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 나를 기억 못 하는 거야? 슈나이더라고...

segments.text: Oh, sorry …
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아, 미안해...

segments.text: I'll get you out right now ... Back to our citrus orchard in Sicily …
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 지금 당장 널 여기서 꺼내줄게... 시칠리아에 있는 우리 감귤 농장으로 돌아가자...

segments.text: Shh ... be quiet! We will be back home soon.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 쉿... 조용히 해! 곧 집에 돌아갈 거야.

segments.text: You?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: You chased us here!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기까지 따라오다니!

segments.text: It is you! You are abusing this girl ... evil murderer, I must stop you!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 역시 네가 저 여자를 학대하고 있었구나... 사악한 살인범 같으니, 반드시 막고 말겠어!

segments.text: Don't piss me off. Get lost!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 짜증나게 하지 마. 꺼져!

segments.text: Sonetto's arcane skill rushes toward Schneider. Unlike what she used to cast, this one is like a blade made of anger.
segments.translation: 소네트의 마도술이 슈나이더를 향해 돌진한다. 평소 그녀가 사용하던 것과는 달리, 이번 것은 분노로 만들어진 칼날과 같았다.

segments.text: Uggh …
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 으으윽…

segments.text: The girl falls down from Schneider's back. She opens her eyes and rushes to Vertin in panic.
segments.translation: 소녀가 슈나이더의 등에서 떨어진다. 눈을 뜬 그녀는 당황한 채로 버틴에게 달려간다.

segments.text: No! No! I'm not arcanist! I'm not arcanist! I'm not arcanist!!
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 아니야! 아니야! 난 마도술사가 아니야! 난 마도술사가 아니야! 난 마도술사가 아니야!!

segments.text: I didn’t ... won't pretend to be an arcanist ... Oh ... I-I-I can't ... can't drink anymore ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 난... 마도사인 척하지 않을 거야... 아... 더... 더 이상 마실 수 없어...

segments.text: We're here to help. Stay calm, miss.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저희는 당신을 구하러 온 거예요. 진정하세요, 아가씨!

segments.text: She seems to have lost her mind: despite what others say, she just keeps repeating the same incomprehensible words, hands grasping the one in front of her.
segments.translation: 그녀는 정신을 잃은 것 같았다. 다른 사람들이 뭐라고 해도 아랑곳하지 않고 이해할 수 없는 말만 계속 반복하며, 두 손으로는 앞에 있는 사람을 붙잡고 있었다.

segments.text: Uggh ... Let go ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 윽... 이거 놓아…

segments.text: Sis ... don't be like this. You are safe now.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 언니... 그러지 마. 이제 안전해.

segments.text: What the hell did they force you to eat! F**k!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 도대체 뭘 먹인 거야! 젠장!

segments.text: Huh?!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: You are her sister ... I ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저 사람이 언니라니... 나는 당연히...

segments.text: She took the Truth Serum. I have memorized the formula. The feel and smell of the liquid could confirm it.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 진실의 약을 먹었어요. 제가 그 조제법을 외웠거든요. 액체의 촉감과 냄새로 확인할 수 있어요.

segments.text: Let her lie on her back. Right arm high. I will conduct first aid and get her vomit up the potion.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 똑바로 눕히고 오른손을 높이 올려. 내가 구토를 촉진하는 포션으로 응급처치할게!

segments.text: ... Ok. Be quick.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: ... 알겠어. 빨리 해.

segments.text: The coming sound of footsteps seems more and more oppressive to those who are stranded by this labyrinth.
segments.translation: 이 미로에 발이 묶인 이들에게 점점 가까워지는 발소리가 더욱 위압적으로 느껴진다.

segments.text: Woosh! Woosh!
segments.translation: 휘익! 휘익!

segments.text: The whipping sound of vines echoes in the corridor.
segments.translation: 넝쿨이 휘갈기는 소리가 복도에서 메아리치며 울려 퍼진다.

segments.text: It is followed by countless footsteps, which implies danger that approaches like a swarm of greedy insects.
segments.translation: 그 뒤로는 수많은 발걸음 소리가 이어지는데, 이는 탐욕스러운 벌레 떼처럼 다가오는 위험을 암시하고 있었다.

segments.text: Oh! We got company! We need to get out of here fast!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 아! 추격병이 따라왔어요! 어서 여길 빠져나가야 해요!

segments.text: Schneider stands up.
segments.translation: 슈나이더가 일어선다.

segments.text: Stay focused. Forget the rest.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 집중해. 나머지는 잊어.

segments.text: Don't worry. Leave it to me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마. 나한테 맡겨.

segments.text: Just a little more time, she will spit it out ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 조금만 더 있으면 금방 토해낼 거야...

segments.text: Woosh! Woosh! Woosh!
segments.translation: 휘이익! 휘이익! 휘이익!

segments.text: Someone walks toward them leisurely out of the dark.
segments.translation: 어둠 속에서 누군가가 여유롭게 그들을 향해 걸어온다.

segments.text: Her arcane skill has destroyed every inch of the corridor as she approaches.
segments.translation: 그녀가 다가오면서 그녀의 마도술이 복도의 구석구석을 파괴했다.

segments.text: Waffles, the new enemies are not something we can deal with!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 큰일입니다, 새로 온 적들은 우리가 감당할 수 있는 상대가 아니에요!

segments.text: Everyone,I found the exit!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 모두들, 출구를 찾았어요!

segments.text: This is where we crashed into! As long as we push out the "Auto Island", we can escape from here!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 여기가 우리가 추락한 곳이야! 오토 아일랜드만 밀어내면 여기서 탈출할 수 있어!

segments.text: Everyone, start pushing now! We have to get out of here!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 여러분, 어서 같이 밀어요! 여길 나가야 해요!

segments.text: As the enemy approaches from the distance, a group of men in black rush out from another corner.
segments.translation: 멀리서 적들이 접근해오자, 검은 옷을 입은 일행이 다른 모퉁이에서 급히 뛰어나온다.

segments.text: They look around, panic-stricken, and eventually their eyes fall on Schneider.
segments.translation: 그들은 공포에 질린 채 주위를 둘러보다가 결국 슈나이더에게 시선을 고정한다.

segments.text: Is it here? Is the exit here?
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 여기야? 출구가 여기 있는 거야?

segments.text: Boss! What should we do?
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 보스! 어떻게 할까요?

segments.text: Here you are ... The exit is here.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 여기 있었구나... 출구는 이쪽이야.

segments.text: Push the car!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 차를 밀어!

segments.text: New guys push the hood! Keep pushing! On my mark!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 신참들은 앞쪽으로 밀어붙여! 계속 밀어! 내 신호에 맞춰!

segments.text: Ready? Push! Ready? Push!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 준비됐나? 밀어! 준비됐나? 밀어!

segments.text: Oh ... I'm sorry. My "Auto Island" is too strong ... Umm, it's ... it's not moving at all …
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아... 죄송해요. 제 오토 아일랜드가 너무 강해서... 음, 그게... 전혀 움직이지 않네요...

segments.text: I'm running out of strength …
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 힘이 빠져가고 있어...

segments.text: Mr. APPLe! The "Heaven Apostle"!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미스터 APPLe! 천국의 사도를 써!

segments.text: Oh!
segments.speaker: APPLe

segments.text: Please move out of the way! This is very dangerous!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 다들 잠깐 비켜주세요! 이건 아주 위험하니까요!

segments.text: Three rounds left, then right, open the wing, put on the wheel ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 왼쪽으로 세 바퀴, 다시 오른쪽으로... 날개를 펼쳐서... 핸들 위에 놓은 다음...

segments.text: Stay away from the car!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 차에서 떨어지세요!

segments.text: Oh ... wow!
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: The car is blasted to the street! Get out of hole while you can! This wall is about to collapse!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 차가 폭발해서 길 위로 밀려났어요! 얼른 구멍 밖으로 나가세요! 이 벽은 곧 무너질 겁니다...!

segments.text: The car is blasted to the street! Get out of the hole while you can! This wall is about to collapse!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 차가 폭발해서 길 위로 밀려났어요! 얼른 구멍 밖으로 나가세요! 이 벽은 곧 무너질 겁니다...!

segments.text: Run ... I can hold a little longer ...
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 도망가... 내가 조금 더 버틸 수 있어...

segments.text: Four. Five. 6. Quick! We're all out! Just you!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 넷. 다섯. 6. 빨리! 다 떨어졌어! 너 혼자뿐이야!

segments.text: Timekeeper! The wall is falling down!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼! 벽이 무너져요!

segments.text: ... Sorry. Please, don't run away.
segments.translation: ...실례지만 도망가지 마세요.

segments.text: In the blink of an eye, she is now standing in front of them.
segments.translation: 눈 깜짝할 사이에 그녀가 그들 앞에 서 있었다.

segments.text: Judging from her speed of approaching and the range of her arcane skill, it won't make any difference even if all of them manage to escape from the bar.
segments.translation: 그녀가 접근하는 속도와 마도술의 범위를 고려할 때, 설령 그들이 모두 술집에서 탈출한다 해도 별다른 차이는 없을 것이다.

segments.text: Only four are left inside the wall.
segments.translation: 벽 안에는 네 명만이 남아 있다.

segments.text: Sonetto is trying hard to maintain balance at the exit while carrying Marian on her back.
segments.translation: 소네트는 마리안을 등에 업은 채 출구에서 균형을 잡으려고 애쓰고 있다.

segments.text: Timekeeper ... Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼... 타임키퍼...!

segments.text: You are ... Schneider, right? Did I ... get away?
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 당신은... 슈나이더 맞죠? 제가... 도망친 건가요?

segments.text: Yes. You made it.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그래. 해냈구나.

segments.text: You are free now.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 이제 자유야.

segments.text: Go. Run freely.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가서 자유를 즐겨.

segments.text: Leave the rest to me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나머진 나한테 맡기고.

segments.text: Vertin and Schneider gently push them out of the exit.
segments.translation: 버틴과 슈나이더가 그들을 출구 밖으로 살며시 밀어낸다.

segments.text: The next moment, the wall has collapsed, blocking the only way out.
segments.translation: 다음 순간, 벽이 무너져 내리며 유일한 출구를 막아버렸다.

segments.text: Heh heh ... surprisingly, there's a day ... to fight side by side with you, Ms. Governor.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤... 뜻밖이네... 총독님과 나란히 싸우게 될 날이 오다니.

segments.text: Let's see what a good match we are.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 호흡이 잘 맞는지 한번 볼까.

segments.text: It's win or die.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이기거나 죽거나야.

segments.text: Huh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider

segments.text: ... It's you?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 당신인가요?
